name: GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Thinning & Hair Loss
about: What it is: A clean, vegan hair serum that improves the appearance of hair density and reduces signs of shedding for thicker-looking hair in as soon as 90 days.*..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Thinning..Key Benefits:.- Increases appearance of hair density.- Reduces signs of shedding and fallout.- Leaves hair feeling stronger and more resilient..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Turmeric: Increases the appearance of hair density..- Caffeine: Stimulates the scalp..- Red Clover and Mung Bean Blend: Nourishes the scalp and promotes healthier-looking hair...Fragrance Description: A light, citrusy scent with floral undertones...What Else You Need To Know: This best-selling hair serum, powered by plant-based actives, reduces signs of shedding and fallout. Apply the fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula to the scalp daily to support an optimal scalp environment for stronger, fuller, healthier looking strands...Clinical Results: Based on a 120-day consumer perception study of 40 participants using GRO Hair Serum once daily:.- 93% said they saw less shedding.- 90% said they saw an improvement in the appearance of their hair.- 83% said their hair was stronger and more resilient...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Turmeric: Increases the appearance of hair density.Caffeine: Stimulates the scalp.Red Clover and Mung Bean Blend: Nourishes the scalp and promotes healthier-looking hair...Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caffeine, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Callus Conditioned Media, Citrus Bergamia Peel Oil Expressed, Sodium Phytate, Pentylene Glycol, Limonene, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Lactic Acid, (Trifolium Pratense (Clover)/Vigna Radiata) Sprout Extract, Linalool, Sodium Hydroxide, Biotin, Alcohol, Phytic Acid, Linalyl Acetate, Pinene, Nicotiana Benthamiana Octapeptide-30 sh-Oligopeptide-2, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-9, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-86.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Fill dropper and apply serum directly to scalp..- Massage in..- Use on wet or dry hair..- Do not rinse..- Use daily.

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for the GRO Hair Serum by Vegamour, but it turned out to be a huge disappointment, especially given the premium price tag.  First off, the product arrived without a box, instructions, or even an ingredients list. I had to dig through the website to find this basic information, which is inconvenient and unprofessional. The packaging itself felt cheapu2014the pink and gold design seemed more suited for a bargain beauty product than something positioned as high-end.  As for the formula, alcohol is noticeably present and appears to be a main ingredient. This is a huge red flag for me, as I intentionally avoid alcohol in both skincare and hair care due to its drying effects. Additionally, the heavy fragrance was overwhelming and unnecessary for a product intended for scalp care.  Unfortunately, this product failed in both presentation and formulation. I cannot recommend it to anyone looking for effective and thoughtful hair care solutions. No and no.

reviews.review_title: Ladies with hair loss this is a MUST

reviews.review_text: This product is incredible! I started losing hair after wearing extensions for years and Vegamour hair serum restored my bald spots in my head. I tried this product for a week and it already worked that quickly. I received this in exchange for my honest review! I cant recommend it enough if you struggle with hair loss ladies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it has amazing ingredients like biotin, tumeric, caffeine, and peptides. I also noticed that it has Bergamot oil, which is an essential oil. In certain individuals who may be sensitive to it, it may cause an inflammatory reaction if used daily which may lead to hair loss.   The first thing I noticed was how cute the packaging was. I did feel like the bottle was very small-only 30ml, which is very small compared to other hair growth serums I have tried. The serum had a very tolerable smell. And when I applied it on my hair, it was very light weight and absorbed very quickly. It did not leave my scalp feeling greasy or heavy.   I havent used this product long enough to notice hair growth, but its interesting (with how expensive it is) that you have to commit to 2-3 months of using it to determine whether or not you had positive results from it. It was definitely a costly serum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a while. I have noticed a difference in my hair. I have thin yet coarse hair. It is brittle and getting very light on top. It stopped growing. I can add this to my wet hair, and it does not get greasy when it dries. I can add to dry hair. I add it to my hair morning and night.   The first thing I noticed was the length of my hair. It's finally growing. This is water based so it is easy to get all over my Scalp. With that being said, I am absolutely noticing that my hair is growing thicker. The light spot on my head is slowly growing hair.   I absolutely love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum for a few months now, and Im beyond impressed with the results! As someone who has struggled with thinning hair, finding a product that actually works has been a game-changer for me.  From the first application, I noticed how lightweight and non-greasy the serum is. It absorbs quickly and doesnt leave any residue, which is a huge plus for daily use. Over time, I started to see my hair looking fuller and healthier. The thinning areas around my temples are noticeably thicker, and my hair feels stronger overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have just spent the last 90 days with this serum. Its been a trial of patience but looking back to then vs now Im seeing the improvement. My hair overall feels and looks healthier, and Ive had a salon appointment 2 months ago as well. Now my major pain point is this section of my hair line its what is most noticeable for non existent hair. What I am seeing is lots and lots of fine baby hairs coming through which I am loving. Overall Im pretty happy with the results so far and Im going to keep on for another 90 days purchasing my own kit to see how it goes. I applied this daily, and I wash my hair about 4 times a week and that was still the same. I would apply to the scalp and then spend 5 minutes using my scalp massager before styling my hair. Overall it wasnt hard to add into my routine at all.   Thanks vegamour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I dont think this product is for those like me who shower at night. This a serum thats supposed to be left on the scalp. As someone with very fine, thin hair that gets oily quickly, I could absolutely not stand how this felt in my hair. It felt straw like and oily. It would work well if you put it in at night if you were washing hair in the am. Unfortunately night showers work for my life so this was difficult to get consistent use out of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I suffer from Hashimotos with a ton of hair loss. I started using this and not only did I grow my hair back but I now have baby hairs in areas I never had hair before. So beyond thankful!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying out this serum for about three months now. It is to be applied directly to the scalp daily and massaged in. It is very easy to use, but probably the hardest part is remembering to use it daily. I would give myself probably about a B+ in that department; not perfect, but pretty good. I like that it feels weightless on the scalp and doesnt make my hair feel u201cdirtyu201d. I usually apply it before bed. My hair is very fine and thin and always has been, but it is definitely getting thinner as I approach menopause. Obviously, I did not expect the serum to change my hair type. Like, I did not expect I am suddenly going to have a thick, luscious head of hair lol. My hope though was that I would see noticeable differences in growth. After three months, I have noticed a lot of baby hair growth. It is encouraging. My stylist noticed it as well when I went in a few weeks ago. Im not sure that Ive noticed any huge differences in shedding, though. So did I see results? Yes, I think so. Like I said, a lot of new growth. Did it change my life in 3 months? No. Will I continue using it? Yes, because I still have another bottle. After that, Im not sure. Obviously this is a product that you need to really take your time with, and I am wondering if six months would give me a better idea of what this product might do for me. On the other hand, Im not sure if the difference is big enough for me to keep making the investment. I will use up the rest of my stash and then I will decide. Do I recommend this? Yes, because I did see some results. However, keep in mind that this is not a miracle treatmentu2026 at least in my experience.

reviews.review_text: Used it for 3 months. Did not see any improvements.  Dont waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair for a few months now, and Im genuinely impressed with the results. Ive noticed a significant reduction in hair shedding, and my hair feels fuller and healthier overall. The formula is plant-based, which I appreciate, as it doesnt contain any harsh chemicals. The scent is subtle and pleasant, and Ive also found that it doesnt weigh down my hair or affect its natural texture. Consistency is key with this product; it took a few weeks to see noticeable results, but the improvement in my hairs thickness and density has been well worth the wait. If youre dealing with thinning hair, the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum is definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_text: I received the 3 month bottle supply and used 2 and half almost three bottles on my mothers hair. Consistency is definitely key!! My mother has tried it all and this is the first product to actually make a difference. After just one bottle the results started to become very clear. reviews.review_text: I recently decided to try out Vegamour's hair serum, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed with the results. I've been using the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum for about 90 days now, and the difference in my hair's health and appearance is remarkable. **Packaging and Application:** The packaging is sleek and user-friendly, with a dropper that makes application easy and precise. The serum itself is lightweight and non-greasy, which is a huge plus for someone with an oily scalp. **Ingredients and Scent:** Vegamour prides itself on using clean, plant-based ingredients, which was a major selling point for me. The serum contains powerful botanicals like mung bean, red clover, and curcumin, all known for their hair-strengthening properties. The scent is subtle and pleasant, not overpowering like some other hair products. **Results:** After consistent use, I noticed a significant reduction in hair shedding and an increase in hair density. My hair feels thicker, stronger, and overall healthier. Its not an overnight miracle, but with patience and regular application, the results are definitely worth it. **Value for Money:** While Vegamour products are on the pricier side, I believe the investment is justified given the quality and effectiveness. They also offer subscription options which provide some savings and convenience. **Overall:** I highly recommend Vegamour to anyone looking for a natural and effective solution for improving their hair health. The combination of high-quality ingredients, ease of use, and noticeable results makes it a standout in the crowded hair care market.

reviews.review_text: I struggle with fine hair that sheds a ton and lack of hair growth. I took the GRO Hair Serum for 3 months and never missed a day, the key is to stay consistent! Within those 3 months Ive noticed a ton of hair growth! I cant wait for my hair to continue to grow! However Ive notice my hair still sheds quite a bit but not as much as before. If youre looking for new hair growth this product is definitely for you! Ive attached photos to show the hair growth on my hairline. This product was given to me by Vegamour in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing hair serum!! It is portable and smells great! Used this product consistently and it has absolutely helped my hair grow out and feel thicker and fuller than ever. I received something in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the is product some much!!! It helped my short hair grow long in a very short amount of time!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this product for about 3 months now, and i can say I dont love it but also dont hate it. The consistency is more watery than id like so it does run down if you put it too close to your hairline. You should massage it on for best results. It does say it wont make your hair oily and although i agree somewhat i do think it makes my hair dirtier faster. I normally wash my hair every 4 days but i felt the need to wash it quicker which i dont love lol overall it has helped grow some of my thinner areas on the sides and havent had a lot of shedding so Id say thats a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

This isnt magic, but has definitely given me some results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using the serum twice a day, as recommended, and within the first few weeks, I noticed that my hair felt thicker and fuller. After a month of consistent use, I could see a visible reduction in the amount of hair shedding, and my hair appeared to be growing faster than before. Ive been using this product for 3 months & a little goes a long way! Its light and manageable, and the serum absorbs quickly into my scalp.  While the results may vary from person to person, I can confidently say that Vegamour's GRO Hair Serum has been a game-changer for me. It has not only helped to improve the thickness and overall health of my hair but has also given me the confidence to embrace my natural hair without feeling self-conscious about thinning or hair loss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw results after using his product the hair that has grown and feels so much healthier feels thicker Fuller and I really in love this product. It feels so good in my hair. It does make my hair a little greasy at first, but then it goes away.

Now I did notice that I had to wash my hair more often while using this or else my scalp would get itchy but  it wasnt to bad I switch to a weekly and appears to bi weekly wash routine while using. For me personally I dont think I could use it if I had a protective style I was intending to keep in for two months plus. But if your doing mini twist or wash and gos and commuted to a routine and growth. A good addition to the routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im not sure if this product works or not, but Ive only started using it 5 weeks ago.  What I have noticed is this: increase in breakage around my bleached highlights.  Ibe been highlighting my hair for 20+ years and spend quite a bit of money and effort to keeping my hair looking as u201chealthyu201d as bleached hair could. This is the only product Ive added to my routine. Im experiencing a ton of breakage about 1-2 inches from my scalp - which is where the product will migrate toward when massaging into scalp.  Perhaps its just me, but blondes, be cautious and pay attention.   I only use a straightener 1-2 times per week on a low heat setting so its not from heat damage.  Im starting to look like a science centre experiment where the static makes the broken hair stand up in all directions (and constantly hav to use oils to flatten in down).  I think Ill pass on this product moving forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this product did not work for me. I purchased the Advance Gro serum and used it for almost a year. I probably would have stopped using it after 3 months if I saw more negative reviews on the product. I was told by customer service to continue using it to see results.If you are young without any issues, it may work. I think many people believe it works because of the serum, but I think it's really about messaging the scalp. This is not FDA approved, so there is no scientific evidence that this product really works. I think they have great marketing and only show positive reviews. This is a really expensive product to use on a regular basis, so think twice before purchase.

After using this product for three months, I unfortunately didnt see the best results. My edges are thinning out and I was really hoping it would help, but I think that I need to give it more time to work. I would love to see this product work for me so Ill try it a little longer.

Something I will say is my hair looks/feels very healthy. There is a lot of softness and shine! Ive also noticed less shedding in the shower or on my hairbrush. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I have so much new hair growth, my hair definitely feels fuller when I put it in a ponytail. Ladies, RUN dont walk and get it. Make sure you are consistent and results wont make you wait long.

reviews.review_text: I have fine hair that seems to have thinned after dealing with seborrheic dermatitis. reviews.review_text: I recently started using the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum, and I am beyond thrilled with the results. I would easily rate it 5 stars!  Firstly, one of the standout features is that it doesn't leave my hair greasy u2013 a common concern with many hair serums. This lightweight formula makes it easy to incorporate into my daily routine without any unwanted residue.  As a new mom experiencing postpartum hair loss, I was desperate to find a solution. Vegamour GRO Hair Serum came to the rescue! The positive changes in my hair were noticeable within weeks. Not only did it effectively combat my postpartum hair loss, but my hair now appears noticeably thicker and more beautiful than ever before.  What's even better is the amount of compliments I've received on my hair since using this serum. Friends and family have taken notice of the improved texture and overall health of my hair, leaving me feeling more confident than ever.  Vegamour GRO Hair Serum exceeded my expectations and delivered outstanding results! If you're looking for a reliable solution for hair loss that won't weigh your hair down, this serum is definitely worth the investment. Five stars all the way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Vegamours Hair Serum for thinning hair for 3 months consistently and I'm thrilled with the results! After consistent use, I've noticed a visible improvement in my hair growth. The serum's formula is effective, leaving my hair feeling healthier and thicker. I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a reliable solution for thinning hair. The applicator is easy to use and the smell is pleasant. I noticed that it also did not make my hair greasy after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Warning: if you have dry, sensitive scalp, please do yourself a favour and skip this product. I was really excited to try this serum however after the very first use my scalp was covered in red, painful sores that took over 2 weeks to heal. This product contains a very significant amount of alcohol (second ingredient). Denat alcohol disrupts skin barrier allowing moisture to escape resulting in redness, inflamed skin and yes, you guessed right, painful sores.

reviews.review_title: Finally a solution to my thin hairline !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Vegamour GRO Hair Serum for the past three months, and I'm thrilled with the results. As someone with thick hair , that struggles with hair loss at my temples from wearing a ponytail , finding an effective and clean solution has been amazing.  The serum is easy to incorporate into my daily routine. Following the suggested usage, I fill the dropper and apply it directly to my scalp. The fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula makes it suitable for both wet and dry hair, and there's no need to rinse, which is convenient.  The key benefits listed u2013 increased hair density, reduced shedding, and stronger, more resilient strands u2013 have proven true in my experience. I noticed a visible improvement in the thickness of my hair within the promised 90 days. The combination of turmeric, caffeine, and the red clover and mung bean blend seems to create a potent formula that not only stimulates the scalp but also nourishes and promotes healthier-looking hair.  One aspect I appreciate is the delightful fragrance. The light, citrusy scent with floral undertones adds a pleasant touch to the application process without being overpowering. Plus the texture is more like water so it doesnt affect me from styling it .  What sets Vegamour GRO Hair Serum apart is its commitment to clean, vegan ingredients. Knowing that it's plant-based and free from harmful additives adds to the appeal. Considering the staggering statistic that 80 million Americans suffer from hair loss, with 40% being women, this product's holistic approach to hair wellness is commendable.  Vegamour GRO Hair Serum is a reliable solution for those dealing with thinning hair, offering visible results and a refreshing approach to promoting sustainable hair health.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Vegamour's GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair, and I must say, it has been a game-changer in my hair care routine. From its ease of use to its lightweight and non-greasy formula, this product exceeded my expectations.  The ease of use is definitely a standout feature of this serum. The application process is straightforward, making it a hassle-free addition to my nightly routine. The serum's consistency is just right, allowing for effortless distribution without any sticky residue.  One of the most impressive aspects of Vegamour's GRO Hair Serum is how it feels on the scalp. The lightweight formula is a breath of fresh air compared to other products on the market. It doesn't weigh my hair down or leave an unpleasant, greasy feeling. Instead, it absorbs quickly into the scalp, creating a soothing and refreshing sensation.  I prefer using the serum at night before bed, allowing it ample time to work its magic while I sleep. The serum's gentle and non-intrusive fragrance adds to the overall calming experience. I wake up feeling confident that I've given my hair the care it needs without any inconvenience to my daily routine.

It's also super quick and simple to apply with the dropper. So even when I was running around in the morning or super tired at night, I never skipped this step in my routine since it's just so easy! Now for the results... this made my hair grow but also made it SUPER healthy and shiny looking again! I couldn't believe the difference it made in just 3 months. That being said, if you're going to do this, I think it's really important to know you need to commit to applying it every single day! It's similar in that way to eyelash or brow growth serums. If you stop using them, they stop working.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am thrilled to share my experience with the Gro hair serum for thinning hair. After using it for over two months, I am absolutely in love with the results I have achieved.  First and foremost, I have noticed a significant improvement in the length and thickness of my hair. It feels fuller and more voluminous, which has boosted my confidence tremendously. The serum has effectively addressed my concerns about thinning hair, and I couldnt be happier with the outcome.  What sets this serum apart from others is its ability to fill in my bald areas and make them look fuller. This has been a game-changer for me, as it has helped me regain a sense of self-assurance. Its amazing to see how this serum has transformed my hair, making it appear more luscious and healthy.  Another aspect that I truly appreciate about this serum is its lightweight formula. I can use it every day without worrying about it making my hair oily or weighing it down. This has been a pleasant surprise, as Ive had issues with other products in the past. Additionally, I havent experienced any irritation on my scalp, which is a huge relief.  To top it all off, my hair has also grown in length since I started using this serum. This is an added bonus that I didnt expect, but I am absolutely loving it. The serum has undoubtedly contributed to the overall health and growth of my hair, and I couldnt be more grateful.  The Gro hair serum for thinning hair has exceeded my expectations in every way. It has made my hair longer, thicker, and has filled in my bald areas, all while being gentle and non-irritating. I highly recommend this serum to anyone struggling with thinning hair, as it has truly been a game-changer for me. @fabbeautyboss

I will definitely continue to use it to keep making progress.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping that this was going to help me. Let me preface with saying that I have had hair loss a lot of my life due to medical reasons- stress and anemia. I am very anemic right now also aging- I am 45 so the patch I wanted to work on is really thinning. I was very dedicated with applying the serum. I always had an issue of the best way I should be applying it. The area I wanted to treat was at my temples and it never felt like it was sinking in or getting to the right area so I was always worried I was applying it wrong. It does make your hair a little oily so you have to choose the right time to use it. I wrote them to ask if the stronger formula might be better for me but I never heard back so I just continued with this. The truth is that I believe I have seen some small Growth in these 3 months. And doing something is better than doing nothing. I am not going to say this doesnt work because I have other factors like health reasons that may make it harder so keep that in mind when purchasing. However if you are just someone experiencing mild thinning and going through a hard time I would give it a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Vegamout hair serum and I have been trying out for 1-2 consistently as directed. I do see a little change in my hair but nothing overly drastic. My hair is very thing to begin with and I can see there is a bit of new hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A calming routine easy to remember as it feels good to massage the product into the scalp, and it smells good as well. I cant say that Ive noticed a considerable difference for my personal hair issue, but I wouldnt count this out for everyone as not every hair loss problem is the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has never been so soft and shiny. I will continue to use and tell my friends. I am using all of their products. The scent is nice too. You should give it a try too. I enjoyed how quick I had results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how you get a 3 month supply! I will be honest that I dont always remember to use it daily but I can still notice a difference even though Im a little behind! Easy application and doesnt make my hair oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this hair serum for 3 months! Oh my godness i have experienced so much new hair growth. The hair serum feels incredibly lightweight & easily absorbed into my scalp. My scalp loves how hydrating but not greasy it is. Very impressed with the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this products religiously for 3 months on my hairline, near my temples. I had high hopes because I love all of the other hair products from this brand, but I did not see any hair growth in these areas. I gently massaged it into my scalp as directed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really interesting product. Its non greasy and is almost a watery texture. My results are also mixed. I dont have re-growth where my hairline has thinned, but strangely enough I recently went blonde and had a ton of breakage. Where my hair broke off in literal clumps, it grew back super fast! Id say almost an inch in the 3 months Ive been using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this serum consistently for 30 days. The dropper makes application easy - I massaged 1 full dropper into my scalp daily. It feels lightweight and absorbs quickly. I used it on wet and dry hair, morning and night with no oil buildup before styling. My thinning edges for my 4c hair feels stronger and looks thicker after 3 months. I'm thrilled with the results and will keep using this formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair consistently for 3 months. I've been noticing my hair thing and on my hairline I had a bald spot that was forming and it scared me because my hair is very important to me. I really love that it is plant based and vegan.  It was easy to apply with a dropper and even after 3 months I have product left over. It doesn't take a lot to see results. I made a specific haircare routine and added this in and within the 3 months the bald spot on my hairline reduced by more than half. I noticed that my hair has brown thicker throughout and it sheds less. I'm really happy with these results and can't wait to see what the next three months will be like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this consistently for three months I used on my scalp And used a scalp Scrubber To spread The product and i must say i definitely saw some Growth my hair grew about three inches i would Definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband and I tried it. Together and it works wonders I think its an amazing hair grow product. We used it for 3 months. I used it 1x a day a t night actually. With a clean hair. I feel it has worked   I received them in exchange for a review post to try.
GRO serum honestly helped my hair grow back and longer than it has been in a while! It's longer, thicker, and has a beautiful shine ever since I hit the second month of use! 10/10 love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like using scalp serums to help improve how thick and healthy my hair looks and feels. This scalp serum has a water based formula to help improve hair appearance and growth. The instructions say to use a full dropper each day and massage it into the scalp. The dropper is mostly easy to use though I found one squeeze only filled it about halfway and was unsure of this constituted a full dropper or just a half. The formula doesn't leave greasiness and did a good job of absorbing. I did notice that with regular use I tended to use my dry shampoo more frequently for oiliness but the serum also helped limit the dry shampoo buildup and helped my hair look more voluminous and fresh on my no-wash days. Over the past few months of use I also noticed general improvements with my hair looking more thick and less wispy as well as more resilient and less prone to fall out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives me horrible headaches.  I don't get headaches very often but every time I use this stuff my head starts to throb within a few hours.  I threw it out.

reviews.review_title: Great for thin hair like me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GRO hair serum by Vegamour is an amazing product that leaves my hair looking more thick and full than ever before. After using it for the last few months, Ive definitely noticed a difference in how full and healthy my hair looks, especially when I compare pictures of my hair now to pictures from the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the product for 3 months now and have actually seen growth around my hair line. After having my daughter a year and a half ago I noticed some post partum hair loss. Its also a really nice serum its more of a watery formula so when you apply it doesnt make your hair super greasy. When I apply it before bed i wake up and my hair feels really hydrated or you can apply it after the shower. Either way the formula is perfect I wish more hair serums were like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! I seriously noticed my hair getting so much thicker and healthier. The packaging is also so pretty and adds to my lineup beautifully. I think this works best if you have thin hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this. The sent smelt like oranges. This definitely helped my hair grow supper quick and not only that but supper thick. I would definitely repurchase this. This is the best hair serum that i have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This such a great hair serum. The texture is watery and lightweight. It absorb quickly to my scalp without leaves any stickiness and doesnt makes my scalp greasy. As you can see in the picture this serum helps my hair grows faster ud83eudd7a It also helps strengthen my roots and reduced my hair loss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair growth trip helped so much with hair growth specifically within my baby hairs. I was worried I was losing hair due to stress but this hair trio serum really worked well in helping me see growth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did like it alot and also most important It doesnt make my hir oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always struggled with growing my hair. I have naturally wavy dry hair, and Ive never found a product that works until now. I love this oil because its dry and you can use it whenever you want!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Only after a few days, I noticed my hair not only getting longer but thicker. The product has a great smell. I was worried putting it on my dry hair would make it greasy, but it did the complete opposite. It gave my hair a nice smell and kept my hair looking fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed with this serum. I was skeptical at first to try but I am so happy I did! I have tried several growth serums but this formula is the only one that is water based and does not leave any residue or clog my pores/follicles. Which is great since you do have to stay consistent with it to see results and that is the hard part and for that reason the water based formula is so important. I have noticed significant hair growth and have so many baby hairs coming in that its hard to style and keep them down. Highly recommend this serum if you need hair growth! I recommend to do it before bed or before restyling your hair to dry.

reviews.review_title: Great for unresolved hair loss, sensitive scalps
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product because my mom struggled with post-partum hair loss, and has never been able to regain density. Vegamours three month regime is non greasy and super easy to use, which is perfect for those who do have fine hair/ lack of density. We noticed novel growth in the hairline areas specifically, as well as all over. My mom is super sensitive to products as well, and this didnt give her a reaction! We love it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So my hair really doesnt grow a lot. So it was kind of one of those things that was like a u201cmight as well try itu201d type thing. I will say I was pleasantly surprised. Now, is my hair just astronomically different? No, but you can tell the growth I do have is healthier and it did improve the growth overall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. So I've been using this for 3 months straight and I definitely see a difference in my hair definitely being thicker and fuller. I've gained so much more confidence now and I feel my absolute best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product consistently for 2 months applying it in the mornings sometimes on dry and sometimes on wet hair. Its super easy to use and didnt leave my hair oily. But I didnt really noticed any improvements or new hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used the bottles for 3 months. I have naturally curly hair that I bleach blonde regularly so I wanted a product that would keep my hair healthy & develop new growth. During my first bottle I didnt notice a lot of difference but at the start of my second bottle I started to see a lot of my baby hairs come in on my crown area. Not only new growth but I feel as though my hair has grown out so much, more than regular. I will definitely purchase more myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Patience and consistency are the key with this product. I love this for the lightweight, easy to use formula that smells good. My hair has been slowly growing back baby hairs in areas that were previously empty. I really like it and will continue to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour GRO hair serum is a MUST! You do have to be patient with this product but its amazing. I use it every night before bed during my night time routine. Super easy to use, just apply one full dropper to scalp and rub it in. It doesnt leave your hair feeling oily, which is amazing! Lastly, this serum is water based so it wont build up on your scalp!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I didn't see a significant improvement in my hair to be able to tell if this product did anything versus it was my hair just naturally growing out normally. I think it's really hard to say whether this product does anything if you were doing a before and after without having a control side where you don't use this product at all, ideally using something inert in the formula to act as a placebo. I think it can't hurt to use this but I wouldn't expect it to be a miracle product and a substitute for healthy diet sleep and lack of stress.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ive been using vegamour gro hair serum for a few months. ill be honest and say i wasnt consistent but i believe there is a little difference in density around my hairline. ive always had baby hairs but this product did appear to sprout some more baby hair and fill in some of my hairline. im going to keep being consistent as i have two other bottles to go through and im still on the first one. aside from the little growth i experienced, i enjoy that the product is a water based serum. sometimes oils are too much for my scalp and my hair needs to be washed more frequent than usual. i would say this product is somewhat like skincare for a the scalp and im loving it! i cant lie, i was skeptical because im black with textured curly/coily hair but overall i am happy with the product and will continue to use it!

reviews.review_title: A must have after postpartum hair loss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this serum for the past 3 months and it has helped tremendously with my hair growth. After having a baby, I experienced so much postpartum hair loss and from all of that hair loss I had multiple bald spots and was having trouble growing my hair back. I inserted a before and after of my new hair growth in the areas that used to be bald. I used the product every single night for 90 days and these were my results. Im so happy with how well this product worked for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this has actually made my hair feel so much more thick and voluminous! It has really helped with my confidence and how my hair looks and feels! Its been really nice so far and I will for sure be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum really works! You definitely have to be consistent and use it every day! I would miss a few times but other than that I was pretty good at applying it every night. I am still on my last bottle out of 3 bottles. I can notice the thinning areas are looking more full! I like that the serum doesn't make my hair oily either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum for three months consistently. I think ive really seem a difference in how many baby hairs have started growing in especially in the front of my hair. will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_title: Must Be Used Consistently and Continuously
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like my Vegamour Shampoo and Conditioner, so I was stoked to receive a three month supply of Vegamours GRO Hair Serum! I suffer hair loss due to menopause and my hubby has a bald spot from wearing a hat. At first I was going to use the serum myself, but was interested to see how it would help my husbands hair. u2728  Since his area of concern was on the center crown of his head, I was easily able to see where to apply the serum as well as the results. I diligently applied the GRO Hair Serum to his scalp daily and massaged it in. He got frustrated because it took well into the second bottle to start seeing any results. I wouldnt say the serum completely made a difference, but it definitely made and improvement. u2728  He had no issues with irritation or any weird side effects. At the end of the three months my husbands bald spot was definitely fuller but not completely. He was pleased with the outcome. The only thing we werent fond of is that now that we have ran out of the three month supply, his hair is starting to thin out again. So we feel its a product that doesnt give long lasting results without continual usage. u2728

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after losing all of my hair from chemo, I was looking for a product that would help it grow back fast and healthier than it was. this stuff really helped. I use it every day after my shower and people marvel at how quickly my hair is coming in. I get lots of compliments on the length, color and softness which I think is funny as I do have some gray hair in there too but somehow it just looks shiny like highlights! I love this product and will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this serum  consistently for 3 months.  I have noticed a lot of filling in around my hairline, and those baby hairs are growing quickly. My overall hair length doesnt appear to be much longer, but with my curl pattern (and inconsistency), its hard to tell. My hair feels longer and thicker. I really like that its a water-based serum, so it doesnt leave any kind of residue or texture on my hair or scalp at all. I typically use it in the morning, and you wouldnt know by looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I legitimately love this product so much. Ive been using it for the last 3 months, and my hairstylist commented on how much visible hair growth she had seen! Its so easy to use at night before sleeping, and leaves no greasy roots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not oily or heavy. Its like skincare for your scalp.  Ive seen great results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first about this grow serum as many other hair growth serums but this stuff works!! I do use this along with the shampoo and conditioner. Have been using it for close to two months now and already seen major changes and new hair growth. I was losing hair every time I would wash my hair or brush it and the amount is less and less now after using this product. I love that this product is clean and contains safe ingredients. Works well and does what it says! Cant wait to see the end result after a couple more months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this product for about 6 months. I like that it doesnt make my hair greasy, but it is absolutely overpriced for the amount you get in a bottle. One bottle doesnt last anywhere near 1 month when when using sparingly. Havent seen any results yet, will probably continue using for a few more months to see if there are any changes and if not, discontinuing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far I like the product it is not oily or sticky. It is very light on the hair. It doesnt have a harsh overwhelming scent. Would like to continue to use. Also would like to give to my brother to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So to give a little backgroundu2014I started using this product after trying u201cThe Ordinaryu201ds hair serum first. I read reviews and figured it was more expensive so it must be more effectiveu2014WRONG. Ive been using Vegamour for a few months now & Ive started to shed more again like when I did before using any hair serums. This serum is over hyped and doesnt work well at all. I had better results using u201cThe Ordinaryu201ds serum. Overall I wouldnt recommend Vegamour to decrease shedding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this by Vegamour and this has truly changed my hair line and Ive tried a bunch of products on the market from both high end and drugstore. Seriously a game changer and so worth  the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had a lot of breakage from coloring my hair and a lot of baby hairs. I used this everyday for 3 months and noticed my hair slowly growing back. You have to use it consistently to see results within a few months. Its not something that happens in a few weeks. But when you notice the difference, its very rewarding. I use to be very self conscious about my hair but this has helped a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I use pretty much every day before I go to bed. when I wake up in the morning my hair is super silky. Not to mention overtime Ive seen growth and improvement in the texture of my hair. I trust this brand on my hair growth journey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a couple months now and I've definitely noticed a difference in the density of my hair. I have fine thin hair and my roots look fuller now, especially along my hairline. That being said, one bottle doesn't really last 30 days for me, the one drop full isn't enough to cover my entire scalp. I know it's water based to prevent buildup but it runs down your face/neck when applied bc the consistency is that of water so it doesn't stay in place. I also wish the dropper wasn't glass bc if you drop it, it breaks. All in all, I liked the results I saw.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try this product out for 3 months. Within the three months of trying the GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair I did notice new growth and thicker baby hairs growing in. I believe that using this for a bit longer there will be a tremendous difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this hair serum, for reference a previous hairdresser overprocessed my hair which led to extreme matting of the hair and then it came out in lumps. I didnt think this was going to work when I tried it, but I stayed consistent and after 3 months I had a lot more wispy baby hairs growing out and a thicker braid too! I will continue to repurchase this.

reviews.review_title: I thought my hair would never grow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My edges were thinning and my hair has never been thick. After using this vegan GRO Hair Serum everyday for 3 months, I am so surprised on how much this serum actually works for me. I can definitely tell my hair is shedding less when detangling in the shower. My hair feels thicker at the scalp. My edges still needs improvement, but I can see a huge difference and Im loving the results. Consistency is key for seeing results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this GRO hair serum for thinning hair by Vegamour. Its not oily so it didnt leave my hair greasy after using it. I feel like a noticed a little bit of a difference more so on my hairline. I think this is a good product and if you are consistent with it, it will work well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using the vegamour hair serum for about 3months now and I can see hair growth. I definitely had postpartum hair loss and this has helped not sure if I stop using it if it will affect the growing hair but this is a must try for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is amazing !! I sadly have very fine , thin hair that I also bleach. I also have been under a lot of stress which makes my hair thin out and fall out more !! Ever since using this serum, I noticed baby hairs growing around my hairline, even my hairdresser noticed the difference ! I focus this serum on my problem areas such as around my hairline and it has been working wonders. You do have to be consistent with using the product and it will pay off !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ive always have thin, brittle hair and its always been a challenge to grow my hair out long. using this serum for 3 months, my hair seems to be getting stronger and healthier. less breakage and healthier growth at the roots!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product consistently for about 2 months now, and I can genuinely see the growth in my hair. Not only does my hair feel stronger, but it has significantly grown since I started using this product! I apply it every night to my scalp and my favorite part is it does not leave your hair feeling greasy AT ALL! From someone with very oily hair, I am thankful I have found a scalp growth serum that doesn't make my hair greasy, and genuinely works so well.  I was gifted this product complimentary of Vegamour, and I am so grateful because it truly has become a staple in my haircare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for a month religiously and I started to notice new growth/baby hairs where I was placing the product. I have pretty thin hair and this did help with new growth in thinner areas. It was really easy to use, I put some drops on every night before bed. I have found other hair serums to dry my scalp out but this one did not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am already a fan of this brand. After using this hair serum for 3 months, I am impressed with its results. Initially, I was thinking about whether this would work for me or not but after continuous use, I have seen a great improvement in my overall hair. My hair looks healthier and stronger than before. I am surprised that this has actually worked. I have noticed a significant difference in the length and thickness of my hair. It does not irritate my scalp and is not greasy at all. It is easy to use and I only use it once a day, just apply it on your hair, and let it do its work. It smoothens the hair and you can feel the difference in texture as soon as you apply it. After using this for 3 months I have also noticed how soft, stronger and fuller my hair is. I am so glad I added this serum to my hair care routine.  After seeing its results it is no wonder why it is my favorite serum. This is a powerful hair serum that helps to promote hair growth and leaves hair looking softer and healthier. I strongly recommend this to all and see the change yourself.  Tip: Try using it every day to see the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I saw so much baby hair and my forehead hairline looks so much fuller now. Consistency is really the key here. After the first month you did not really see much of a change but after going consistent until halfway of my second bottle, I started seeing (very noticeable) new-growth hair! And I really love how the serum feels super lightweight, literally just like putting water on your hair and it dries up quickly and it doesnt give you oily feel too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am quite impressed with how good this Hair serum has Worked for me! Ive been using it on the top front half of my hair for a few months now and I am impressed with how much of a difference it has made. If you struggle with thin hair and have some bald or low density spot this is definitely the product you should try! Im so happy I started to use this product and will continue to use it so I can see how much more of it difference it will make!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for a while I was so surprised how much thicker and abundant my hair looked and felt. Even others noticed the difference. After years of bleaching my hair, constantly straightening it, and age, Ive noticed my hair thinning around my middle part. It got worse during the pandemic due to stress. So far Ive noticed my middle part is not as thin as it used to be and even my hairline looks fuller. Ill definitely be using this long term for better long lasting effective results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair by Vegamour for a few months now and I'm truly impressed. Not only is it easy to apply, but it's also lightweight and non-greasy, making it perfect for daily use. I've noticed a significant reduction in hair shedding and my hair feels stronger and healthier. The natural ingredients like red clover and mung bean have definitely contributed to the visible improvement in my hair's thickness. The serum has a pleasant, subtle scent that doesn't overpower. It's become an essential part of my hair care routine, and I'm excited to see continued results. If you're struggling with thinning hair, I highly recommend giving this serum a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im 3 months deep on this hair gro serum system. I was fairly consistent and am really happy with the quality of my hair health. It definitely has helped hiw my hair feels through bleaching and heat damange. Time will tell on the growth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has given me my hairline and confidence back! I love a super slick up-do, but I was noticing thinning and damage to my hairline. reviews.review_text: Three months ago #vegamourgiftedme three of their Gro Hair Serum bottles for thinning hair. I was pretty skeptical about this product as there are so many on the market that promise hair growth. After three months of absolutely religious use once a day, I can say that I definitely have seen new hair growth. This product will not make someone with naturally thin, fine hair suddenly have thick hairu2026but it can sure help you grow back what you have lost! I have baby hairs sticking up about an inch or so all over my head!! Its crazy! I plan to keep using this and see how far I can go!

One thing I do love about it is its totally non-greasy. I used it at night with a gua sha comb for extra massage and my hair looked clean and totally fine the next day! For the included photos, the first one was taken May 26, 2023 and the second was taken August 10, 2023.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So this past year I have experience hair thinning for the first time in my life. I did research on good ingredients for a serum and this one looked perfect for me. The dropper packaging made it easy to apply precisely. After a few weeks, I noticed my hair was stronger, thicker, and longer. I also had fewer hair breakages. reviews.review_text: When it comes to hair care, the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum is revolutionary. This ground-breaking product has a plethora of advantages that make it worthwhile to try. reviews.review_title: Less shedding and baby hair coming in fuller!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had noticed my hair losing fullness and thinning a bit at the crown, and shedding a ton! I've heard that it's a side-effect of COVID, or maybe it's just a sign of aging. Either way, I was not happy about it! I have really fine hair as it is, so don't have much wiggle room to work with volume-wise. I did a lot of research on what growth serum I wanted to try and I was excited to try Vegamour. After a month of regular use, I noticed much less shedding when brushing and showering. After three months of consistent use, I also noticed that the areas where my baby hair was very sparse are really coming in. The product is super easy to use, and I especially love that I can use it on wet or dry hair since I don't wash my hair every day. It dried fully and quickly and didn't leave an oily residue. I would usually apply before bed, but I just took a little dropper, spread it across my scalp, and focused on areas that were thinner. There's no smell, color, or really any indication I've put anything in my hair after a few minutes, which is ideal.  I'll definitely keep using this and hope the shedding continues to decrease! A little goes a long way, especially if you have finer hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the GRO Hair Serum for thinning hair for three months now, and I am absolutely thrilled with the results! This product addresses an issue that affects so many people, and I'm delighted to share my experience. First and foremost, the statistics about hair loss are eye-opening, and it's reassuring to know that there's a holistic solution available. The 360u00ba approach to Hair Wellness makes complete sense, considering the various factors that can contribute to hair thinning. What sets GRO Hair Serum apart is its plant-based, vegan, and clinically-tested formula. I appreciate that it not only supports a healthy and balanced follicular ecosystem but also soothes the scalp and revitalizes hair roots. It's clear that this serum was designed with a deep understanding of hair health. The exclusive 90-day campaign is a brilliant concept. Having three bottles to use consistently for three months allowed me to thoroughly evaluate its effectiveness. And let me tell you, the results are impressive! I started noticing visible improvements similar to the before and after photos provided. My hair felt stronger, and I noticed less hair fall. My scalp felt healthier, and my hair had a renewed vitality to it. It's important to emphasize that results may vary from person to person, but the fact that I experienced such positive changes in just three months speaks volumes about the product's efficacy. If you're dealing with hair thinning or loss, I highly recommend giving the GRO Hair Serum a try. It's a holistic approach that works, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to participate in this campaign and share my positive experience with this transformative product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used hair growth serums in the past, so I was excited to try a new one! I love the way this oil felt in my hairu2014it didn't feel or look greasy, and it rubbed into the hair/scalp very easily. I have been using it consistently for 2 months and I have noticed increased hair growth in my problem areas. Overall, I think the product really does work when used consistently!

reviews.review_text: This product was given to me by the brand, as a complimentary gift. Grow Hair Serum is a plant-based, multi-tasking product that promotes healthier-looking hair by reducing signs of shedding and promoting thicker, fuller hair. It is clinically proven and highly effective, using a combination of vegan phytoactives to support a healthy follicular ecosystem. The water-based formula quickly penetrates hair follicles, ensuring no excess oil on the scalp. GRO is 100% vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and certified clean at Sephora. It is easy to use, requiring only one dropper per day, and can be applied morning or night for best results.  I have been struggling for a long time with hair loss, and no treatment has come close to this result. I accepted the fact that my edges were not coming back. However, the more I used the product, the more I started noticing little changes, and I am loving it. It has been a little over 3 months since I started using products. I am very happy with my results.  This is how to use:  Fill one dropper full and evenly disperse droplets throughout a wet or dry scalp. Gently massage the product into the scalp with your fingertips. Leave in. Style your hair as usual. Can be applied morning or night. Apply daily for 90 days for the best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Vegamour their hair growth serum, and I must say, I'm impressed. As someone who has struggled with hair thinning and slow growth, finding a product that delivers on its promises is a game-changer. One of the standout features of Vegamour Hair Growth Serum is its commitment to using natural ingredients. It's formulated with a blend of plant-based actives, such as mung bean, red clover, and curcumin, which work together to nourish the hair follicles and promote healthy growth. This was particularly appealing to me, as I prefer to use products that are free from harsh chemicals and synthetic additives. The serum itself has a lightweight and non-greasy texture, making it easy to apply and work into the scalp. I appreciated that it didn't leave any residue or weigh my hair down, allowing me to use it both day and night without any inconvenience. The convenient dropper packaging also ensures precise application, preventing product wastage. Over the course of several weeks, I noticed a significant improvement in my hair's overall health and appearance. My hair felt stronger, looked thicker, and even had a noticeable increase in length. Additionally, I experienced fewer hair breakages and shedding, which was a pleasant surprise. It's important to note that individual results may vary, as hair growth can be influenced by various factors, including genetics and overall health. Another aspect that sets Vegamour Hair Growth Serum apart is its commitment to sustainability. The brand is dedicated to using eco-friendly and cruelty-free practices, which is a big plus for conscious consumers like myself. In terms of affordability, Vegamour Hair Growth Serum is relatively competitively priced compared to other similar products on the market. Considering the quality of ingredients and the noticeable results it delivers, I believe it offers good value for the price. Overall, Vegamour Hair Growth Serum exceeded my expectations.

reviews.review_text: My hair type is - dyed, coarse, dry ends and oily roots. I have wavy hair as well. With continued use, I did not feel like the serum weighed my hair down and did not make my scalp greasy/oily at all. There was barely a fragrance which I prefer. I applied it both to wet and dry hair to see if there was a difference, and personally I feel like it worked better for me on wet hair.  Overall, I wouldnt say my hair grew faster length wise, but I definitely noticed it is fuller. I was gifted by Vegamour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Vegamour and here is my honest review: I've been using Vegamour Gro Hair Serum for the past month, and I'm already feeling impressed with the results. As someone who's been dealing with hair thinning and shedding, I was intrigued by their holistic approach to hair wellness. The statistics they shared about hair loss affecting so many Americans, especially women, hit close to home. What caught my attention the most was their plant-based, clinically-tested formula. It's not just about tackling one issue, but a combination of factors like stress, vitamin deficiencies, and scalp health. The water-based serum feels light and quickly absorbs into the scalp, leaving no greasy residue. I love that I can use it daily without worrying about excess oil. While it's still early days, I've noticed my hair feeling stronger and looking healthier. The serum has a soothing effect on my scalp, which is a huge relief. The promise of visible results in 90 days seems realistic, and I'm excited to continue this journey. Overall, Vegamour Gro Hair Serum offers a comprehensive solution for hair health. It's suitable for various hair types and textures, and the 30-day supply per bottle makes it convenient to incorporate into my routine. If you're looking to address hair loss, thinning, and shedding, I'd definitely recommend giving this serum a try.

reviews.review_text: I wasnt sure what to expect from this, but after using it for a month, I can say that I do think it is effective. I did not put a full dropper on my scalp as directed because I didnt actually need it all over my scalp, so I just put it on my fingers and then applied to those spots where I needed it. I cannot say whether the results are permanent, but it is real hair thats growing there and I dont think its just going to start falling out if I stop using this product. That said, I dont know if it actually addresses the underlying causes of hair loss, so if you stop using it, and those are not addressed, your results may not be permanent. I will keep using until I use up the bottle and see what happens. Gifted by Vegamour for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour gifted me their GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair and wanted to share my fantastic experience. I used it daily for a month and I'm really impressed. What I love most is that it's water-based, so it never made my hair greasy or built up. It's so easy to apply u2013 I just put a dropper on my scalp in the morning and massage it in. It's also great that you can use it at night if that suits you better. The serum has a mild scent that's not overpowering, which is a big plus for me. And the best part is that my scalp never felt itchy or irritated while using it. While it takes about 90 days to see major changes, I've already noticed some exciting results. My hair length hasn't changed much, but I see new hair growth. The shorter broken hairs on top of my head (probably from hair dye) have grown about two inches since I started using the serum. My hair also looks fuller near the base. Overall, I'm really happy with this product. I can't wait to see even more results after the full 90 days!

If this is the results now,  I most definitely look forward to seeing the results at its fullest potential. My recommendation. Give it a try for at least 30 days. Find the balance for you and your hair, and stay consistent.

reviews.review_title: Worth the price and worth the review
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont even know where to begin on how amazing this product is. This may be lengthy, but stick it out for me - I am 32 and have recently gone through some truly traumatic life events. I also have an autoimmune disorder and these two things combined lead to a large amount of hair loss. My confidence as a woman was completely shattered. My hair has been such a large part of my identity for so long and I was willing to try anything. Dedicating three months of my life to anything is a challenge but I knew that if the end result was better looking hair that I may be able to stick it out. I applied this to the bald patches on my head every morning. I used a scalp massager to work the serum in to my roots and waited till it dried (which it never made my hair look greasy) and then would style as usual. I did this every single day for 90 days. I am in tears writing this because the results were and are truly worth the wait. I have the confidence again to wear my hair back in braids or in a bun. I am not constantly wearing a hat to hide hair I dont have. And I want to make sure to say that this did not magically give me longer thicker hair - so dont go in to this thinking that. But it did start new growth in areas where I had lost my hair. I was lucky to be gifted by vegamour but this product will be used continuously in my hair routine. This is worth every penny.  The site will not let me post a photo, but check out my before & after on insta @ashlamtu

reviews.review_text: I recently was gifted the Gro Hair Serum complimentary from Vegamour for thinning hair, and I must say, it has been a game-changer for me. As someone who is currently struggling with hair thinning due to weight loss, I was in need of a reliable hair growth solution. After using Gro Hair Serum for several weeks, I am excited to say this serum has helped.   The Gro Hair Serum comes in a sleek bottle and convenient dropper, making it easy to dispense the right amount of product without any wastage. The packaging is attractive and informative, clearly detailing the serum's ingredients and usage instructions.  The serum has a lightweight and non-greasy texture, which was a big plus for me. Applying it was a breeze, and it quickly absorbed into my scalp without leaving any residue. The serum's pleasant scent was an added bonus, as it made the application process enjoyable. reviews.review_text: GRO Hair Serum has been a game-changer for my hair care routine over the past month. Dealing with hair loss due to medication, finding a product that stimulates hair growth without leaving my scalp oily has been a challenge. Thankfully, this water-based serum ticks all the boxes.  Using it consistently after every wash (every other day), I apply it all over my scalp. I love how lightweight it feels and how it quickly absorbs, leaving no residue. Unlike some other products, it doesn't weigh down my hair or compromise its appearance.  While not as potent as Minoxidil, I noticed some new growth and, more importantly, a significant reduction in hair fallout. It has become a key factor in keeping my hair looking and feeling healthy.  What sets GRO Hair Serum apart is its compatibility with clean hair styling. It integrates seamlessly into my routine, allowing me to style my hair without any telltale signs of product use. This has been crucial for maintaining a natural appearance.  Overall, GRO Hair Serum's water-based formula has proven effective in stimulating hair growth and reducing hair fall. It's gentle on my scalp, feels lightweight, and leaves no greasiness. If you're looking for a non-greasy solution to hair loss, I highly recommend giving GRO Hair Serum a try.

reviews.review_text: Alright, I tried this product for a little more then a month - 5 weeks. I have terrible postpartum hair loss and my hairline (18 months later) is still suffering. I tried this product as a hopeful way to grow back those spots that are now missing hair. I received this product as a gift from the brand, so I hate saying this, but I feel like I need to be totally honest with a possible consumer; I saw very little improvement. There was a little bit of hair regrowth, but I dont think it was enough to justify the price and inconvenience of a product like this. I feel like it left behind a residue that caused me to want to wash my hair more frequently then I would like. I also went on a couple of trips and having to bring a bottle of this stuff with me wasnt ideal. I was hopeful because Ive use eye lash serums and they work great for me! So I was thinking maybe this would be similar, but it wasnt. Sadly, I do not recommend.  Gifted by Vegamour.

reviews.review_text: This product was generously gifted to me by Vegamour, and I diligently used it once a day for approximately 30 days. As for the cons, the only drawback is the price. Despite that, I find this serum to be excellent, and I actually prefer it over the Ordinary Hair Density Serum that I was using previously. The only downside is that I tend to go through it quickly, making it a bit costly. However, if you're seeking an effective serum for hair density, fullness, and growth, I believe it's absolutely worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First l, let me say that my hair hasnt been this long or felt this thick in years. Ive been using the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum daily for over a month and Im beyond stoked. I noticed a reduction in hair fall out and breakage, which I feel has contributed to the overall volume and thickness of my hair. One of the things I loved about this hair serum is its non-greasy formula. It absorbs quickly and it leaves no build up. The application process is super easy. With just a dropper, I applied the serum directly to my scalp and gently massaged it in. I tried to be consistent and applied it with my morning routine and styled my hair as usual. But there were a few times that I applied before bedtime on dry hair or after my shower on wet hair. Super easy, no mess no fuss. I am absolutely in love with the results, and I couldn't be happier with the length and thickness of my hair.  Pros: * Noticeable increase in hair thickness and length. * Non-greasy formula with no residue left behind. * Easy and convenient application process. * Hair looks healthier and shinier. * Reduced hair fall and breakage.  Cons: * Daily application (but even that was simple)   This product was gifted by Vegamour.
