reviews.review_title: A hair growth serum that works! Holy grail
reviews.review_text: This serum is amazing!! I suffer from breakage, hair loss, and dry scalp from years of bleach and coloring my hair. I saw amazing results in 30 days with this serum. First off, my scalp seems less dry and flaky. My hair feels thicker and less fragile, more full. And I have tonsss of new baby hair growth along my hairline. Im down one bottle and cant wait to use up the rest of my set! I was gifted by Vegamour in exchange for my honest opinion, however I will continue purchasing this product after im done using my set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair serum is enriched with a blend of nourishing ingredients that work together to promote thicker, healthier-looking hair. The lightweight formula is easy to apply and doesn't weigh down my hair, which is a huge plus.  I have been using this hair serum for a month now, and the results have been remarkable. Not only does it provide an instant boost of volume to my hair, but it has also noticeably reduced hair fall. I've noticed fewer strands left behind on my brush and in the shower, which is a huge relief.  Additionally, the serum has improved the overall texture and manageability of my hair. It feels softer, smoother, and looks healthier than ever before. I've even received compliments on the increased thickness and fullness of my hair, which has boosted my confidence tremendously. Gifted by Vegamour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved how this serum worked on my hair. I lost a lot of hair postpartum and nothing was helping 2 years later, until I started using this over 1 1/2 months ago. I like to use it on dry hair as it didnt weigh my hair down. It is very lightweight and didnt leave my hair greasy but felt good on my scalp. As someone who has a sensitive scalp I found this to be soothing. This serum gave me so much new growth where I had no improvement with other treatments. Its a huge recommendation from me to all my family and friends. Gifted by Vegamour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Consistency is the key. You didnt lose hair overnight so dont expect them to grow back overnight. Ive been using it daily for about a month before I started noticing less shedding and even some baby hairs. About the second month mark, I definitely could tell the difference. I typically use it right after a shower or in the evening to lessen the potential exposure to disurbtive elements like the weather, etc. And it is very easy to use, just one dropper for the whole head and massage to ensure the product penetrates into your scalp. I know lot of people complain about the price but the low self-esteem and confidence from thinning hair and balds spots are worth investing to prevent. Ive had success using their shampoo and conditioner so Im almost entirely using their products now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

My edges were almost completely gone from wearing extensions and since using this serum, my edges have started to grow back. Ive tried everything and nothing as worked. Im so amazed with the results of this hair serum and how much my edges have grown. Ive seen it advertised but never knew it worked so well until I tried it. You wont be disappointed! I highly recommend this serum! Gifted by Vegamour. Honestly you will love this serum.

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Vegamour. I had a positive impression of Vegamour before I ever tried this product. I rub in one dropperful in the evening before bed. It doesnt seem to have much of a scent, which is fine. I rub it into my scalp with my fingertips. It is easy to use. reviews.review_text: I bought this product direct from Vegamour.  I have only used it for a week so of course no real results have surfaced yet.  I find the application to be a challenge. The bottle is expensive and small so it is not ideal if you have a lot of surface area to cover.  The product is also a liquid so you need to be careful how much to dispense from the dropper at a given time.  On several occasions the product just dripped down my forehead onto my face.  I think I would prefer a product that you can spray at the roots onto the scalp.  I will keep using it to see if makes any different in terms of hair growth in the isolated areas where I apply it.

reviews.review_title: It Works! Great for All Hair Textures
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am Black with natural hair. My hair is 4C, medium density with fine strands. My hair grows and an average rate but I struggle with retaining length because of breakage. I started using this a few years ago and love it so I'm thrilled that it's now at Sephora. Most growth products in the Black hair industry are oils or heavy serums and cause buildup. But since this is a more watery consistency, I started using it on my hair when I had braids in so I was able to really see the results because I had to have my hair rebraided more often when I was using it consistently. Now I have locs and am similarly seeing clear results, and have to retighten my locs more often. Some say it's expensive, but out of all the hair growth items that are recommended by dermatologists that truly work, such as Nutrifol, this is more affordable. You have to stick with it for 2-3 months (which is 2-3 bottles) to really start seeing results, but it's worth the investment!

It is a game changer I even took a video because I could not believe how much new growth she has all over her head. I just feel you have to find your own formula or cocktail in order to stimulate new hair growth. I believe shes found her recipe. Unfortunately video will not Upload .file to big.  I am only writing this review because I understand how important hair is for it everyone.  In hopes that I can give hope to someone looking for answers for hair loss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My demanding life has been thinning out my luscious locks! With working hard, stressing out, being in harsh weather, and getting (ever-so-slightly) older, various spots of my scalp were starting to show through where they used to be covered with my fine, plentiful hair. The look wasnt good for me, and compounded the run-down feeling I already had from everything else going on. Once doing something about the issue became a serious priority for me I started applying vegamour once a day, (almost - nobody is perfect haha) everyday, just like the bottle says. It didnt take much each time, just one full applicators-worth of serum, and I started to see the signs of new little hairs in under a month. Throughout the subsequent weeks of use I have noticed a substantial improvement in my areas where the hair was starting to really thin out, so much so that I really dont notice the scalp in those parts of my hair any more. I feel better because I look better, and a big part of that is my better hair thanks to vegamour

reviews.review_text: [Gifted for free by Vegamour] I have been using this GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair for 3 months and I was excited to try this product out as I've heard nothing but good things about it. Admittedly I haven't been as consistent with it - for example, I forget to use it DAILY so there are times when I have skipped some days. When I saw there wasn't much improvement in hair growth around my temples that's where I stopped using it daily. I did notice an increase in the strength of my hair and less shedding on the days when I used it consistently. I also feel like it has made my hair feel fuller and healthier. The serum itself is very light and felt like water - and it didn't leave my hair greasy or oily, there's no scent. I'm rating this as a 3 simply because after a month and a half I didn't see much hair growth but that could be the lack of consistency and I might try the shampoo/conditioner after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm pretty sure I've had some sort of undiagnosed hormonal imbalance for a few years now and I had hair loss in one small spot near my crown. It wasn't shiny bald, I could see my hairs in their follicles, but that spot wouldn't grow and the tiny hairs that did grow around the spot were soo sparse, straight, and wouldn't grow at the same rate as the rest of my hair. This serum brought my hair back to life! Within the first week of using about 1/3 of a dropper daily the density of the area with the tiny, straight hairs was thicker! Within a month the problem spot started growing healthy hairs and my curl pattern came back to the sparse hairs. I've been using the serum for over three months now and I'm only halfway done my first bottle, I love how far it goes if you're just spot treating. I have around 6 tiny curls/coils within the problem spot that continue to grow and the area around the spot is definitely flourishing. The serum is watery, absorbs completely, and smells lightly of rose. It'll take a while for my hair to catch up and even out but it's so much better than it not growing at all! I've tried other oils and products that didn't work but I honestly think my main problem is hormonal so I love this serum and can't wait to see my results when I finally finish my third bottle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for three months, and in that time I got really, really sick. That being said, my experience with this product might not be the norm for every single person. Some people might have had a better experience with us because they didnt get insanely sick while using it. I also used other Vegamour products while using this. In general, I have a very positive outlook on the company. The products I used worked really well.  All that being said, I dont really feel like this did a ton for re-growing my hair. My hair is still incredibly thin. I still feel like my hair is very thin in certain spots. I dont know if that is more to do with how sick I got though. Im not really sure. Honestly, I couldve lost more hair from just getting so sick. I will say, my scalp health has been so much better since using this. As a scalp serum, this is really great.   This product does not actually contain any FDA approved ingredients to cause new hair growth. This doesnt have minoxidil in it so its not going to actually cause new hair to grow. I think if you have the right expectations for this product, you probably wont be let down. Make sure you read reviews and look at the ingredients to know what youre getting into. You really do have to use this for the full three months to see any kind of results. Its not something thats going to work overnight. Its not a miracle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair for three Months prior writing this review! I faced some hair thinking due to Covid and stress of past years and this serum was sent just in time! Just one droplet a day for three days and my hair is so much visible fuller and healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a hair miracle. This product is wonderful for brings thin hair back to fuller, healthier and more noticeable thickness. My hair has never been better. my hair is growing I recommend if you want best results to use this alongside with the grow shampoo and conditioner. This serum bring grow new hairs on the scalp and helps with shedding. Its a slow process but it definitely works. With that in mind, I feel that the shampoo grows hair on the everywhere other than the scalp as in neck or top of the forehead because it is hard to get the product massaged into the scalp. Ive noticed that the shampoo tends to stick to the hair and neck when Im massaging. Another side to the shampoo is that is makes my hair feel squeaky clean. The conditioner makes the existing hair grow longer, more shiny and stronger. Therefore using the serum along with the shampoo and conditioner is best for Ideal results. I totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 3 months and my hair has been looking so long and thick lately! I'm very pleased and it's very easy to use since it's only one drop a day which is convenient. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this serum for 3 months and was curious if I would actually see a change in my hair, and I definitely did. I notice now that it is more fuller than when I started, I have also noticed that I don't lose as much hair as I used to when showering. I am loving how full my hair looks which makes it look healthier - definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in complete shock. This serum has transformed my hair. After having my daughter I was struggling with PP hair loss. My hair around the frame of my face was gone. I was bald in a few places. After 3 months of consistent use you can see how my hair has grown back thicker and fuller. I am so happy. I used half a dropper every night before bed. The serum absorbed well and didn't leave behind any type of greasy residue. I also really appreciate that it's a plant based formula and I didn't have to worry that I was applying any harsh chemicals to my scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been intrigued by Vegamour Gro Hair Serum for a while, so I didn't have to think twice when I got a chance to try it out. I really like that this product doesn't make unrealistic claims and that it's recommended to use it for a few months in order to see the results. I've been using this serum for 3 months now and I wanted to share my results. The directions tell to use one dropper of serum for the whole head, but since I was only concentrating on my sparser areas near my temples, I used half of the amount applying the serum every day. It's a very watery product and I love how easy it is to apply. Since I didn't use a whole dropper, the bottle lasted me longer than a month. About 2 months into the serum, I thought I had some tiny effect, but I wanted to wait until the recommended time before evaluating the results. Well, that time is now! The hair in mv temple areas are more sparse and they grow very light, but it's not an issue for me. After using the hair serum since August, I do see some extra hair growth and a few darker hairs, but the changes are pretty minimal. I never paid close attention to the hair growth, so I can't tell for sure if it's the result from Vegamour or if it's just how my hair grows. For now, the changes do not justify the cost and time for me to recommend this serum. However, everyone's hair is different and I might just need more time, so I will continue using this serum and hope that the results will be more obvious in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product! I was given a three month supply to calculate a true difference in my hair. It takes one full dropper to the scalp for full transformation or you can spot treat for it. I would use it on my head soemtimes but mostly spot treat my front. Great product worth a try , needs consistency though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using the 3 months system by GRO hair serum. I already can see new hair growth at the one month mark. My main concern are the receding hairline and my hair parting line. This works really well for the hair line. The hair growth pattern is not exactly where you placed the serum, it kind of eventually become more full but now all at once. I am confident that with consistent usage I could get amazing result. If you have flat and heavy hair type like me, I think this will make the hair looking a bit more greasy in the morning / throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was not expecting as much as I got out of this product! I dont see the biggest difference in thickness of my hair but my hair is so smooth, healthy, and growing so fast. I get so many compliments on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

My hair is curly and long, I do use a lot of hot tools to style or straighten my hair and I do have suffer some breakage and thinning on some areas . So far These serums are doing their magic. My husband has also been using for thinning hair on top and swear its working better for him!! He just wishes the bottle was a different color/not glass for traveling purposes.

reviews.review_text: This serum smells so good and has so many benefits in it as well. I have very dry hair and my hair in general is very weak. I did not see excessive change in hair, it still doe continue to fall but i do see my hair being a little thicker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: #vegamourgifted me this GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair. Thank you #vegamour #skeepersfamily This three month supplies of Hair Serum is really a game changer for me to at least regain some of my confidant back after losing quite a lot of hair through radiation.  I've tried so many product out there to no avail until I saw this GRO Hair Serum from Vegamour. I was a bit hesitated at first because I didn't want to disappoint myself if I didn't get the result that I was looking for. Moving forward, after months of using this product, the Vegamour GRO Hair Serum has changed my mind. I love the way how slowly and steadily my hair is improving every day. I see a lot of new hair growth on both sides and the font of my head. I noticed that the strand of my hair is getting stronger and appears healthier. I have seen less hair falling out from my hairbrush and that is quite a relief. The serum is easy to apply on the scalp, hair and it feels very comfortable without any irritation or itching feeling.  Although my hair is gradually improving, but so far I'm very happy with the progress that I'm getting from this hair serum. Thanks Vegamour, my hair looks healthier than months ago and I'm literally regain some of my confidant back.

reviews.review_title: So glad I stuck with it!!
reviews.review_text: I was a bit nervous to try this product and to commit to 90 days of something (Im guilty of wanting quick fixes for everything like a lot of us) but I am so glad that I stuck with it! I had noticeable new hair growth after the first and second month (lots of new baby hairs), and had a noticeable increase in fullness by the third month. I had a few patches of extremely thin hair near my scalp, and that is now full and I can no longer see pieces of my scalp when my hair is pulled back. Theres so many hair growth products on the market that its hard to know where to start/what to commit to, but Im so glad I have this a shot! My confidence has definitely been positively benefited!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went through two pregnancies. After first one during postpartum hair loss I just took hair supplements. After second pregnancy I used this serum. The difference in hair regrow is incredible. Stick to it for few months and you will be hooked for good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works! I cut my baby hairs around my hairline when I was a kid and was distraught when it never grew back. Using this product for 3 months, I finally saw growth in my baby hairs that frame my face.  Gifted by vegamour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Vegamour Gro hair serum for the last three months after experiencing post partum hair loss. The serum comes packaged in a pretty pink bottle with a gold dropper. The serum has a light texture and has no color. It was easy to apply to my scalp. I applied to damp hair after shower. There was no scent that I could smell. The serum did not leave my hair feeling greasy nor did it weigh it down so I was able to style as my hair as usual. I really like that the serum is free from toxic chemicals and safe for every day use. However, I have noticed no difference in shedding and I do not have new growth yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair - it is a vegan serum that helps treat hair thinning by increasing the density of it. With continued consistent use of this serum the hair becomes thicker and fuller. I used this serum for almost 3 months and the result is amazing. My hair growth is extremely slow. The amount of growth my hair would see in almost 6-7 months is what saw in 3 months. I am very impressed with this Hair serum. It is not greasy at all. I used it almost everyday and it did not weigh down my hair or made it look oily. It is very lightweight and gets soaked up quickly by the scalp. It can be used on dry or damp scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this product for a few months and I am very pleased with the results. I struggled with my middle parts being a little wider than normal but by using this I noticed that Ive head a lot of hair growth in that area. This serum is very light and not oily at all. It feels like it melts into my scalp and doesnt feel heavy in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Postpartum hair loss has def. hit me harder this time around. (I have two babies.) I started using Vegamour and highly recommend. I believe it will show greater results once I have used it for longer and once my postpartum hair loss slows down.  (if that's even a thing lol)So far, so good though. It def. helps with postpartum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been suffering from hairloss from a thyroid condition. This product has helper me regain my confidence again! My hair volume is now slowly getting back to what it used to. I ding really see noticeable results until after 6 weeks of use but just be patient and results were amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this serum from Vegamour and I've been using this for the past 3 months.   Pros: It's very easy to apply and spreads like water and doesn't weigh down my already thin and fine hair. It doesn't look or feel greasy which is a major plus point for me. Honestly I can see only a few baby hairs growing after 3 months. This serum takes patience and you might not notice any difference until the end of month one or two. I usually apply it after I wash my hair and when it's damp. Overall, I love this serum and my hair looks healthier.   Cons: The dropper is not enough for the whole scalp and I focused only on the problem area until now. After using this for a month I observed when I stop using this devotedly, the hairfall problem will be back. Initially in the first month of using this I noticed some pimple like bumps on my scalp (near forehead) and slight itchiness persisted for a little while. Not anymore! I really wish this was a little inexpensive so it'll be easier to continue buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: complimentary from Vegamour I love this product! A couple of months ago I had a little accident while dying my hair and lost about 60% of my hair. But thanks to this product and a good haircut my hair has been looking incredible. It looks much healthier and fuller. And have been getting lots of new growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Vegamour to try this hair growth serum for 3 months. I have bleached my hair many times and it's damaged. Thus, I am getting old. I use 1 dropper at night every day on my scalp and sometimes to the spot I want to grow my hair.  It absorbs very fast, only need to massage my scalp for a min, and done! The important thing is it doesn't make my hair rough and it's not sticky or greasy!!

I will continue using it for another month to see if i start seeing more new hairs growing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has been thinning this year to the point I started to notice bald spots. I've been using the serum consistently for 3 months and the results truly impressed me! reviews.review_title: Worked on my grey hair perfectly

reviews.review_text: this serum has helped me with my thinning hair! i received this complimentary from vegamour, and have always had fine and thin hair, but more recently i've noticed that it's become more flat with more gaps on the side. i started using this serum and over the course of 90 days, i have noticed more growth and baby hairs along the side of my scalp! you definitely need to be patient with the serum, but i feel like it has helped with the thickness and i'm happy with the progress!

reviews.review_title: Easy to use but not a miracle product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

I absolutely am in love Vegamour after trying this product. I used this product for 3 months consistently and here are my thoughts. First, you will see amazing, noticeable results if you are consistent. I used it every morning for 3 months. I have noticed hair regrowth especially on my hairline. Less shedding and my hair feels stronger and feels like they dont break as much anymore. Also the serum does not feel greasy on my hair. Its a really good product if your concern is thinning hair. I do see a difference that I am super happy with. Will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This actually works!! Consistency is definitely key, I used this serum every morning for 3 months, a full dropper on my whole scalp and I noticed so much new growth around my hairline especially! My whole scalp felt so much healthier after just a few weeks using this, I had less breakage and damage of my hair, and saw new growth that was thicker around my hairline. I've also noticed less hair shedding throughout the 3 months as well, I used to find so much hair on my clothes at the end of the day and that has definitely reduced, so I love that it's not only helping me grow new hair but also protect the hair I've got. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

Ive been looking for something to help with thinning at my hairline as well as regrowth for bald spots that I created as a result of trichotillomania, and was Super excited to try a three month supply of Vegamour GRO complimentary from the brand. I used it along my hairline and on my bald spots nearly nightly for almost the full 3 months now and my results are SO good! Check out my before & after photos, as they speak for themselves. I also have tons of new growth and baby hairs along my hairline as well, and it just looks fuller overall. The hair on my bald spots has definitely grown back quickly and thicker as well, which has been huge for my self-esteem. Big big fan!!

reviews.review_title: Super lightweight hair product that works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is lovely because it is light. I have an oily scalp and I am trying to train my hair to not get oily so quickly by not washing it everyday. I was skeptical about applying a serum on my scalp everyday because like I said, I don't wash my hair daily and using my fingers to disperse it felt like I was just going to get more oils on it. However, this serum does not make my hair more oily. It actually feels absorbs quickly into my hair and is light/thin like water. I applied it daily on dry hair at night-time focusing on my hairline and then massaging towards the entire scalp. I do notice a difference in my hair after using it for 3 months. The baby hairs around my hairline look longer and those were stuck at that same length for a long time so I can definitely see a difference now. It's a very lovely serum. I actually enjoyed it very much. I will probably keep using it along with their gummies for overall hair health and growth which is what I want the most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used Vegamours GRO Hair Serum for 3 months straight every single day and I am extremely satisfied with my results. I was suffering from really bad postpartum hair loss and am so happy that I found Vegamour. Application is easy, with only one dropper full per day. My hair feels and looks softer, thicker, and just SO healthy. This stuff is a miracle worker and I highly recommend giving it a try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After my pregnancies I lost a lot of hair closed to my forehead and I am very happy with the results after using this serum consistently for 3 months. I have too many baby hairs now and my hair looks more abundant. I was nervous at first because I though it was going to have an oily texture. I only wash my hair twice a week . It feels like if I was applying water drops and it doesnt make my scalp oily neither dry. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Wanted so much to love itu2026.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Vegamour the Gro serum kit and used it religiously for 3 months. My hair loved it! My scalp felt hydrated and my roots seemed less frizzy and dry. Unfortunately, I didnt see any real new growth. I was thankful for the experience, but it did not fill in any of my more obvious gaps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband and I have used this product continuously over the past couple of months.  It definitely takes over a month to see a noticeable difference however my husbands hair is a lot thicker than before and I can tell he has regrowth in areas that were more sparse.  Will continue to use :-)

reviews.review_title: A must have for a healthy scalp and new growth!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using Vegamour gro serum for over 3 months, and I cannot say enough good things about it. My scalp has never been so healthy, and i have more new growth than I ever have. One of the things I love most about this product is that unlike some other hair serums that would be for similar use - this one is NOT OILY AT ALL. I put it on my hair before I go to bed, and you literally cannot even tell the next day. Hair growth takes time, and there are so many different factors (stress, diet, etc). Im so excited to see what continued use of this product looks like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a pleasant, almost tangy scent to it which is always a good element to have in a product that you'll be applying everyday. The texture of the serum is as you would expect to make it easy for application on the scalp; it's not too viscous, and applying it into the scalp, root ends was pretty easy.  Onto the results of use after 3 months: it didn't have an incredibly significant effect on hair growth, but did seem to help the integrity of my hair leading to shinier, healthier looking hair strands. It became a familiar supporting hair product that you could tell was offering something to the overall appearance of the hair, especially after brushing and getting the serum totally throughout the head and hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this serum since my 4th month postpartum when my hair was shading like crazy. I didnt notice any difference at first but still continued using it hoping to see the results and I did! It took me two bottles to start seeing less hair loss and healthier hair overall. I just finished my third complimentary bottle and will definitely purchase several more to continue the course. I learned that consistency is a key.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been sent this product as a gift from this brand, Ive been using it for 30 days and actually committed to it after giving birth to keep my hair from falling. It has definitely helped keeping my hair thick and shiny. I would recommend it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im so impressed with this serum! Ive always had fine hair, but after having Covid back in 2020 I lost so much hair, that I started feeling a little insecure about my locks. Luckily, most of my hair grew back, but there were still some areas that looked patchy (mostly on my temples). Ive been using this serum every other day for 3 month (each bottle was enough for 15-18 applications), and my results speak for themselves. Ive already recommended this product to a few friends of mine, and they all have noticed visible results. Thank you, Vegamour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I had my baby I found my hair falling out in clumps and besides texture change, hair was falling out in clumps. It never really went back to the state it was before having a baby. So this serum definitely helped, it brought little bit of that thickness back. Just have to be diligent in applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the Vegamour Haircare products. I have found change in the volume of my hair. The shine also increased. I would definitely go for Vegamour products since I had a positive result. Vegamour gifted me this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with Vegamour for how amazing it works. I have very thin hair and have been using the serum for 3 months now and the amount of new hair growth and baby hairs I am seeing is amazing. It's easy to use and you can definitely see a difference! Complimentary from Vegamour to try out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to try this product on my husbands hair. Lately his hair started to be thinner and thinner. After a few weeks of constant use (of course sometimes he forgot to use it) I started to notice first results. His hair became thicker and healthier. A few weeks later Ive noticed new hair growing. Existing hair also started to grow faster. Can't be more happy! This serum smells very good, the scent is light and calming. One bottle is enough exactly for 1 month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but unfortunately I'm not sure it truly does help with hair regrowth. I think it does help make your natural hair longer but I've seen claims of this product helping with new regrowth and I think that is less likely.    Overall, I do like the smell, It doesn't make your hair oily and I would give it another try but unfortunately I was a little disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product along with the hair vitamins for 3 months and I think I have noticed some improvement in my hair growth. Though I unfortunately did not see some of the new growth on my scalp that I saw in some other review pics, I was able to grow my hair past my chest which is longer than I've ever had my hair in my life. I dye it a lot and am hard on it, and I think using the serums has allowed for better growth and hair quality :) I also love that it didn't make my hair greasy because I have an oily scalp.   I used a dropper a day for 3 months.

reviews.review_title: Hair Growth Serum for Thinning Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour's products are truly amazing and work wonders. For three months I have used their GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair and it truly made quite the difference in helping my hair to get to a more thicker, fuller state. The product was easy to use and apply and really lived up the results that they claimed when I first learned about the hair serum. Would recommend and use again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used any hair oils or serums so this was a first. My hair is super thin and I shred a lot so I thought i'd give this a try. I massage a few drops on my scalp before bedtime and i've noticed my baby hairs getting longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im in love with this brand! The packaging is perfect and the dropper fills the perfect amount. I love the consistency because it spreads nicely over my scalp. Im so happy that its water based and not an oil, which is perfect for everyday use without weighing my hair down or creating any product buildup. Im  excited to try more products from this brand because Im definitely noticing the overall health of my hair has improved tremendously! Im experiencing less shedding and its super easy to stay consistent using the serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair since childhood has been pin straight, very fine, & absolutely zero volume.  After 90 days of use, I feel that my hair has a thicker volume & the sparser areas are definitely growing in.  Is it a miracle serum?  No I am sorry it is not, but with constant use it is definitely effective.  I like that it does not leave my hair feeling greasy & you can not feel any residue left behind.  One dropper full a day makes my hair feel refreshed & healthy.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my hair care
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive using this product since July, and I couldnt notice very easily in the beginning but after I did my highlights my hairdresser told me that I had a lot of baby hairs, and after that I start to pay more attention and I notice that my hair was growing well especially where I didnt have much. So I loved the results so far and recommend to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a prayers answered for me. I deal with hormonal imbalance, which cause hair loss. I been dealing with this issue on and off for over 3 years now and it's been so hard on my self stem. I discovered this product around April this year and I purchased the first bottle. As soon as I started using this product I started seeing results, even though I wasn't using it daily as instructed. Later on towards the end of the summer I found the opportunity to try this product for 3 months in exchange for my review and I immediately signed up, because I had some good results using it before. Long story short, I'm so glad I signed up for this opportunity because I now have lots of beautiful baby hairs in the parts that I was pretty much balding. This product works, specially if you are consistent in the application. And it doesn't smell weird or make your scalp itchy like other serums to help prevent hair loss. I give this a 10/10 and I'm buying more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vegamour Gro Hair Serum works wonders for my hair growth journey. I have received the three-month supply of this Vegamour Gro hair serum which arrived in beautiful packaging. I have thin hair and a lot of shedding. I use this serum every day on my bald spots, scalp, and thin areas after washing off my hair. This serum has clear consistency which is left with no residue and is non-greasy upon application. As a result, I have noticed my hair has gained volume and thickness since using this product. I am so happy to use this product and see clear results that are noticeable by friends and family members. Unlike other products of this type, I love that Vegamore is clean, 100% vegan, sulfate-free and cruelty-free. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Slow results at first but then great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It took a while for results to show for me definitely over 1 month. Once it starts though it continues quickly. I have so many new baby hairs near my forehead and and so glad. I lost so much hair when I had covid and this product has helped tremendously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It comes in a glass dropper bottle which makes it easy to use. The texture is just like water, clear and lightweight, nicely absorbs, and doesn't make hair greasy or oily. I'm suffering from hair loss for so long, and everyone in my family has this problem. Lately, it turned worst because of too much stress. We all know that a poor lifestyle does affect our bodies inside out. However, I still want to do something until my anxiety gets reduced. I was excited to try this serum, heard so many good things about it. Love the lightweight consistency, as I have fine hair, it doesn't weigh it down. I'm using it for more than 2 months now, and I have seen some baby hair start growing on my bald spots which are very exciting. Decided to keep using it for 3 more months, much I love this serum! Give it a try if you are also struggling with thinning or bald spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is one of the best, if not the best hair serums on the market. I haven't seen my hairstylist in about 4 months and when I sat down in her chair, she said, Whoa girl - your hair grew like weeds!. She said it was visibly thicker, fuller, and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Vegamour.  This serum really works with hair growth. Ive used it consistently and have seen some amazing results, new growth and quicker hair growth. It doesnt make the hair oily or greasy either. Be consistent and youll see results!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I this serum for three months and seen such a huge difference in my hair growth! My hair is so much more resilient! It made my hair stronger, shinier, smoother and easier to style! I would definitely recommend this for use of at least 3 months for maximum effects!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! My hair is been doing so much better since Ive been using this. Obviously, its going to take more than three months to see cray channge but for three months I am extremely happy with it! My hair looks better, it grows faster, hair growing. Overall, amazing!  The investment is so worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product for 3 months and seen such a huge difference in my hair growth and strength. It made is stronger, shinier, smoother and easy to style, definitely recommend this for use of at least 3 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour gave me this free to test in return for my honest review.  My thoughts: This hair growth serum does works. I put some a drop on my two sides and then one in my hairline and massage it in. I see baby hair growth and more dense. One con is that the dropper don't reach all the way down the bottle which makes it hard to get the last bit of the serum towards the end. Also it does take consistency

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I do see a difference.  My hair had been thinning since I had my last son. And this product has helped make it thicker. I never really had bald spots, but you can see in my hairline that my hair was thinner. It's a lot thicker now and my hairline looks much better, more filled in. I just rubbed it into the front part of my scalp at night then wash it off in the morning, but if I didn't,  my hair was not greasy or feel goopy. I enjoyed this oil. I do feel its over priced, but it does work without feeling gross. Definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour gifted me a 3-month trial of their gro hair serum. The consistency of the serum is like water. It is easy to apply the serum to the scalp with the dropper and to massage it into the scalp. I found that with regular use I had hair growth. But, the hair growth was not in the areas that I wished I had growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a mother that was suffering from post partum hair loss I absolutely fell I love with this product. It was super convenient to use and never left my hair oily or greasy. I used it after my wag days and before styling my hair with no issues. I see such a BIG difference in my length and so much new hair growth coming in . I would absolutely recommend this and will be purchasing more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!! Ive used this consistently for 3 months and Im super happy with the progress. I have been having hair loss/thinning hair along my hairline for a while and have been working to try to regrow it in to be fuller. I have so much new growth and baby hairs so would definitely recommend this to anyone trying to support healthy hair regrowth! Smells nice, and it doesnt make hair oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! It suprised me that it is not too thick and does not smell! I was pleased that it was not too thick because my hair is easily weighed down by oily products and this did not effect me! Also, I was happy that it did not smell badly becuase other comparable products have smelled horrible before to me and left me with a lingering fowl smell. I look forward to continuing to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have had trouble with pulling my hair out when Im stressed. It was to the point where I couldnt grow hair around my hairline. I tried multiple serums, pills, and methods to help with little to no luck. It all changed with these drops!! It has grown out so much and is so healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this Vegamour GRO Hair Serum for the past few months and I am blown away by the results. If you are suffering from thinning hair, this serum will seriously help you. It's formulated with so many incredible ingredients to support new growth, like Curcuma longa which has been observed to stimulate genetic changes in the dermal papilla cells, and N. benthamiana which supports the hair cycle. Hair thinning and loss is something that is very stressful and it is often difficult to find products that actually work. This is the real deal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using Vegamour serum for 3 months and it really took some time for me to really start noticing results, but now I can clearly see tons of long hairs where I once had baby hairs or no hair at all. postpartum hair lost was not a joke... I used twice at day and Im loving the results so far, one thing that I do have to said is that if you are oily hair this might not be for you since it makes my hair more oily than usually.  Again this is not a product you will see results overnight but overall is a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for 90 days for my thin fine hair. I like that the serum is non greasy and really easy to apply. I used around the area where I was most concerned about lack of volume and density. After 90 days of usage, I noticed a subtle, yet definite improvement to my hair. My hair looks healthier and feels like there is more volume overall. I also noticed my hair line is getting fuller. You need to be patient to see visible difference and if you miss a day or two, don't worry and keep going. Love that this product is Vegan and Clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using Gro Hair Serum for 3 months and I do say that Ive seen a difference. I was very skeptical at first but this product amazed me. I spot treated on my thinning areas and seen a nice improvement after the three month of using it.

reviews.review_title: So far so good! excited to keep using it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am half way through my second bottle and can already see some improvement and lots of baby hair. Now I did take a holistic approach and did two laser and PRP sessions as well (+ started the vegamour biotin supplements) so I'm not sure that I can associate the improvement to this product ONLY. However, here's what I liked about it and why I'm excited to keep using it for the next 1.5 months (or maybe more!): Using it daily forces me to massage my scalp which in itself is really good for blood circulation and hair growth. Product is clean, vegan and cruelty and sulfate free, I'm a pharmacist and the ingredients are GREAT.  The product leaves no residue and was not oily/greasy, so my hair always looks good after I use it.

reviews.review_title: Worth every penny! Love using this on my hair line
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for the last 3 months now and my hair looks so full! I am impressed! Last year I used this product to grow my baby hairs on my hair line and it worked MIRACLES! This product is worth every penny! I always talk so greatly about it on my socials and recommend it to people for hair growth! This was complimentary from Vegamour but in the past years I've bought the product myself and would do it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for 3 months and I really wanted it to work for me but I have to say I did not see a huge difference in my hair. I have a bit of new growth but I cant be sure its from serum or just my hair growing back naturally. It was not gotten longer than the normal rate and the density seems the same. I will keep using it and see if maybe it just needs more time to kick in for me. I have also started to take the gummy vitamins and hopefully I see more changes soon.

reviews.review_title: I can see improvement in my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine hair, and I dont have a lot of it. After Covid I lost about 80% of the density in my hair and it was so thin. It would fall out several times daily just by itself not to mention all that came out when brushed it.  I have been using u201creligiouslyu201d every day for about 3 months now and my hair has not only grown thicker but the shedding and hair loss is much less. I also started getting baby hair which is new to meu2026 I am confident that if I will be using this hair growth serum for another 3 months I can get my hair into a great shape.   For someone like me, with very fine hair, not having thick, healthy locks can certainly improve their hair look, gaining confidence! I think that it is worth to invest in good serums if it does work and this is one of them.  I am planning to order another 3 months supply and keep growing my hair out and getting my full confidence back ud83dude4cud83cudffb

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical but I gave it shot and I am very pleased with the results. I was worried that my hair line especially in one area was getting bald. So I used it as a spot treatment as well as an all over scalp serum. From the 3 months of using it I think Ive had less fall out and healthier growth at the roots. The bald spot seems to look more filled in and less noticeable to me. I love the liquid watery texture which absorbed quickly and wasnt greasy. Complimentary from Vegamour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this Vegamour Hair Serum for 3 months, and I just want to say I am in awe. I have always had finer, thinner hair since my teen years. As I'm in my 20s now, my hair has become even more brittle and weak with no liveliness at all, and with, unfortunately, a few bald spots due to excessive bun usage in my youth. I have tried many products in the past to try to add some volume and thickness to my hair, but they've either grown hair in places I do not want hair to be grown, or I saw no difference at all. This product by Vegamour does wonders. I truly see a difference in my scalp, and feel/see new hairs come. Especially when used with Vegamour's other products, such as their vitamins. The only thing is, it takes time to see results. You need at least 3-6 months to see changes. But when you do see the changes - they are worth the wait. Product was not sticky like other hair serums, and smells good as well. I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the last 3 months and I like it, but was expecting more growth in some areas. I have very thin hair and it looks shinier, but I didnt see as much growth as some others. I started to see the difference after 2 months, so you have to stay consistent. I will give it another try tho

reviews.review_title: Was a miss for me but might work for you...?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im 39 and noticed thinning along my hairline and was excited to try this product, I had 3 bottles to try over a 90 days period, I used the product daily and was a little disappointed that there wasn't much change in how my hairline/edges look like. The product is not greasy, its light. im not sure if its with spending on but it may work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using Vegamour for 3 months now and am definitely seeing new hair growth. I will say I didnt see results right away, so you do have to stay consistent with this if you want to see results. I used it religiously every night before bed and it did wonders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair started thinning after I had my baby 4 yrs ago. I have just been losing hair in the shower, on my pillows. I was excited to be able to try Vegamour serum for my hair and jumped on the opportunity to try it out. I love that this product and cruelty free and no toxic ingredients. I also like that it doesnt leave my scalp sticky, and doesnt even really feel anything after application. Lastly, I definitely felt like my hair calmed down from shedding and my hair felt thicker. I can see baby hairs growing and cant wait to continue using for even more results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This growth serum was wonderful. I have naturally thin hair and have a lot of breakage and new growth along my hairline. After using this product consistently for 3 months, I noticed a lot of growth where it used to break. Overall, my hair just looks and feels fuller. Its subtle, but it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair serum is so good! Results are absolutely stunning. My hair is more stonger, healthier, shinier and less breakage. My grey hair are less in numbers. I use it on scalp every night before going to bed and massage it for 4-5 mins. Its not sticky or greasy whatsoever. Packaging is so aesthetic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy with this product. I have so much new hair growth along my hairline and my scalp. I have always struggled with filling in areas near my hair line and this product has helped so much. My hair is overall healthier and I am so happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started my vegamour journey 3 months ago . This serum is expensive  and I had high hopes. Its bottle is so pretty & comes with a nice quality dropper. Easy to use one dropper a day . I did not really see any big change in hair texture yet but but my white hair are gone wow . I am sure reversing thin hair will take time but it will happen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have any kind of hair thinning happening right now, these are the products you need. I swear they are worth every penny and you will see so much growth. I use them daily and I dont get greasy hair either. Love!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So at first I was pretty skeptical & was unsure if I could be consistent, but I was and Im left speechless. As someone who has struggled with losing hair after having Covid twice, this stuff was a savior. I mainly applied it to my hairline around my forehead since thats where I see the most thinning. While the second photo may not showcase my hair in its entirety, its SO much thicker than what it was. I even had people ask if it was my real hair! Overall Id definitely recommend this to others

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair serum helped me a lot.  I was losing a lot of hair.  and with one month the fall has decreased a lot, almost total.  I loved using this serum because it felt like I didn't use anything on my hair, it has a watery texture.  And after drying, it didn't leave my hair feeling greasy or sticky like some hair loss products I've tried before.  Very easy to apply.  Ari I loved it a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My previous review for this product didnt post so I am sending this through again, but this product definitely works. Slowly, but surely! I saw growth after many weeks of use. I wish that it worked faster as its definitely hard to get into a routine but I was happy with the results following the three month trial. Its a little greasy at first but your hair gets used to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After three months of using this product, I feel that my hair is on its way to being thicker and more full bodied. This product was very easily adaptable to my nightly routine. I recently got my hair done by my hairdresser, and she had mentioned to me that my hair feels stronger. I definitely feel like this product has begun to work, and I am excited to continue and see where it brings me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am really very impressed with this serum, I feel and I can see that it does help my hair growth. I used it more than anything at the entrance since I really wanted to see if it worked, now I see more hair in that part and it makes me happy.  It has a consistency like water, does not leave hair greasy and has a pleasant smell. This serum should be used every day if we want to see results, I used it at night so I wouldn't forget.  I noticed shine in my hair and I like that, it has really been a great experience to be able to use something that works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy hair, but I have been experiencing a lot of hair fall. I used the Vegamore GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair for three months. First time I used the scalp oil I hated it and was ready to leave a bad review because it left my hair oily and took longer to dry but I decided to give it another try and I loved it the second time around!   The difference, the first time I used it I slapped it on without a clue what I was doing. I did some research the second time around, used less oil, and used a clarifying shampoo to get the oil all the way out and that was the trick! My hair definitely looks shiny and pretty after using this oil. I havent noticed a huge difference in softness yet but the biggest game changer for me is that after only two uses my hair has stopped shedding so much! Im noticing less hair loss in the shower which is an indicator that the claims this oil prevents breakage is definitely true.   Anyway moral of the story is take your time to understand how to use this product properly the first time around and if you dont like the results at first make some changes before deciding whether you like it or not. Id be willing to bet most bad reviews are from people like me who didnt understand how to use the product properly at first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I think it was after Covid, i started experiencing hair loss that became EXTREME. I was sooo scared i started thinking Im sick with something. I dont have insurance so I couldnt go to the doctor to check. So all i could do was look for something i could get that could help me with my problem. EVERY time i brushed, if i rolled all the hair that fell, it would be the size of a baseball. If i took a shower, omg, i could probably roll a volleyball sized ball out of my hair. Truly scary. It would just fall with no reason also, and be EVERYWHERE! I had no hope honestly when trying this product. But i did it for 3 months, and it helped me tremendously!!! Im not sure if its vegamour itself or also massaging your scalp with it Every day, consistently. But you can see the results in the picture. I didnt use anything else but Vegamour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this serum to try out because I have PCOS. PCOS was making my hair fall out like crazy. I decided to give this a go. I have medium hair texture and had cut my hair extremely short because I couldnt handle my hair falling. One dropper a day and did it consistently for 3 months. I have noticed more baby hairs on my scalp and hairline. I was struggling with even continuously growing baby hair. The growth is slow, but once you get it you dont lose it. It made my hair occasionally greasy, but that was after the 3-4 day of washing. It has helped me regain my confidence. The growth is slow, but so rewarding.

reviews.review_title: A must have if you have thin hair or hair loss!!
reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this product enough- to be the least dramatic possible, it was life changing. Personally, Ive always had thin hair- not because of heat or damage or anything- just naturally thin hair. At that point, I have tried everything on the market to thicken my hair and nothing worked. After 1 month of usage, I went to get my maintenance haircut and my hairstylist asked me if I was doing something different because the roots of my hair were so incredibly thick - I told her what it was and she ordered it immediately after our conversation. Just goes to show that it works!!! So happy to be one of the first people to utilize this product, and see that it really genuinely works very well. Good luck on your personal hair growth journey!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No scent. No color. Water texture. I use one dropper daily and massage into my scalp with a silicone scalp massager. I like it best after a shower because it leaves no residue if applied under freshly washed hair. After a few days buildup, it does get greasy, but a few days of any product without a shower gets greasy, lol. My hair seems to be falling out less than it was before after three months of use. I will definitely keep using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

Its really helped thickening my hair and will continue using this product and trying to get my husband to start as well!
