reviews.review_text: I have been using this gro serum since about August and I can say I see a difference when I use it everyday. I have thick hair but it falls out quite often leaving some parts of my hair very thin at my scalp areas. I think as long as you use this everyday you should keep seeing a difference in the growth of your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product!!!!! I was about 7 months postpartum when I first started, so you can imagine my hair situation was less than desirable. This product has actually improved some of my thinning areas and has made my hair feel fuller and stronger in general. Its so easy to use and I love that you can use it on wet or dry hair! If youre like me and looking for something to help with thinning hair, no matter what the reason for the thinning, this is a game changer for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with hair loss and I have already seen a significant difference in my hair just in the last month. This product is lightweight and doesnt leave your hair greasy. I will definitely be repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been suffering with hair loss for many years. It got worse after I had my two babies so I was always looking for something to help me to read gross. I was very excited to be kept at this product and try it. I have been using it every day for the last three months. I do feel that my hair has improved in thickness and texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair from Vegamour consistently for three months. One (1) dropper full is not enough for whole scalp. My review for serum and vitamins together.  Last few years Ive been loosing a lot of hair, and stopped seeing baby hair on the edges. At first I didnt see any changes at all, and was disappointed about the hype this product getting. Starting last month I started seeing tiny baby hair here and there, now I have more of them, where I thought Ill be bold.  The thing is, Im still loosing a lot of hair, but at least, Im seeing a lot of hair growing back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was good but not miraculous. Did it make my hair feel better and more soothed which I think helped with hair growth? Yeah, but I dont think an external serum will do much if you have an underlying issue for your hair loss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this stuff. At first I struggled with it. It seemed to dry out my hair. But now I use it as a pre-wash ; 30 or so minutes before I wash my hair every other day along with a nice scalp massage has completely transformed my hair. It has grown super fast and just feels stronger and healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to this product but it did nothing for my hair and i have been using for two months very disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I brought this cause after giving birth I was traumatic losing here and it got to the point where if I even run my fingers through my hair I want to hear would fall out now using this part of my hair falls out more in chunks my hair is thinner and you can see all spots on my head. Plus it made my head itchy. The Sephora rep told me to use it ever other day I did that that for three months and now my hair is so dull and weak and falling out worst. This is honestly not worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my third bottle. I have lost much less hairs than before. I am waiting to see more growth! I will continue to use this product and hope to see better result in the near future

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! The scent is clean, its light weight so it wont weigh your hair down or make it oily. Make sure you use it for the full 90 days because it really does work and youll see growth and fullness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First if all can we talk about packaging? I do love everything aesthetic and this hair serum simply looks nice on your vanity.  Ingredients are really good and clean - the older I am the more I appreciate this aspect of beauty world.  I like the dropper form too - it makes everything much more easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: He estado usando este producto  y tengo que decir que realmente funciona. Debido al gran estres, mi cabello empezu00f3 a caerse por grumos. Todo lo que tienes que hacer es aplicar suero y frotarlo en el cuero cabelludo. Recuerda cerrar el gotero para que no se evapore. El uso diario es necesario al principio, pero despues de ver el crecimiento, se asume la aplicaciu00f3n necesaria. u00a1Lo recomendare encarecidamente! Es un poco costoso... pero como cualquier cosa que sea buena y funcione, deberu00edas pagar por ello.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been really enjoying using this hair growth serum. So far I like how it applies. The consistency is pretty thin and has a light fresh scent. I appreciate that it doesnt make my hair oily when using. You are meant to use the product for 90 days so I will be posting another review with my results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vegamour products! After about a month of use I can see less scalp on my part line. Its not an overnight thing but being patient and sticking with it really helps you see results. I like to just dab it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product works but takes some time to ssee results. When I started using I could not noticed anything but right around 15 days of using I noticed a difference. I wish it was clear what the ingredients were in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I havent even used the product for 3 months like they state and I already started to see a change in my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for 4 months and have to say that it really works.  Because of major stress, my hair started falling out by clumps.  I talked with an Sephora associate and she disclosed her hair loss from cancer treatments.  She swore by this product.  I tried it and am super happy with the results.  All you need to do is apply serum and rub it into your scalp.  Remember to close the dropper so it doesn't evaporate.  Daily use is necessary in the beginning, but after you see growth, as needed application is assumed.  Will highly recommend!  It is a little costly....but like anything that is good and it works, you should pay for it.

reviews.review_title: I was very skeptical in the beginning butu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I was very skeptical about this product. Then I continued to use it daily because it was pricy & I didnt want it to go waste. Its been a month since I used this product almost daily and I just noticed so much baby hair is growing all around my head! I about shampoo & conditioner a week ago as well and Im already obsessed! Vegamour is by far the best hair product Ive used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a little upset i havent even had this product a full month and i definitely have not used it daily and it completely evaporated in the bottle?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive lost so much hair because the stress and also eating disorder so I was concerned about some spots in my head where I couldnt make a ponytail because it was easy to see those spots with just a few hair after using this for three months Ive seen a huge difference, it has been growing a lot and im happy i give this a try! is a must to have if you loose a lot of hair everyday and want to make it grow again

reviews.review_title: 60% of the time, it works 100% of the time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I gave it 3 stars but dont take that as a negative review. This is an amazing product that does eventually show results before you finish your first bottle. Con: the price. BUT, its an amazing product! And the design of the bottle is a bit of a hazard as I found myself nearly spilling my jar over because I had forgotten to put the top back on completely.  I have been using it, this is my first bottle and Im seeing some results. I also have noticed that when I use it that I have to be careful not to use to much as it will my hair greasy and weighed down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend this serum. I had to slow down on it because my hair was growing too fast lol! And I dont want to have to color the roots so often. But this serum WORKS! A little goes a long way. These bottles last a good couple months. Smells amazing as well. You can feel the serum working on your scalp and your scalp has a very nourished and almost tingly feeling as its working. It feels good! My hair also was smoother and more nourished on the days I used this too. As I said I couldnt use it every day as my hair was growing too fast. But at first I did use every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far this has helped so much with my postpartum hair thinning! Pairing with Kerastase Initailiste shampoo & conditioner has given me fuller & thicker hair while dealing with the hair loss!   Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is worth giving it a try.  I see results and will continue to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like this product and its helped me tremendously with my hair. No it doesnt happen overnight or in a few days but consistency and patience will transform your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it religiously and did not notice any difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: used this and all their other products too, daily for at least 6 months. spent hundreds and hundreds and had no results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everything you read about this product is true. After one week of use, hair stopped shedding and looks fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great results with this and the Vegamour conditioner. The first photo is before use, the second is 30 days after use and the third photo is 65 days after starting use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if I've been using this long enough to actually write a review, but I feel compelled. I have naturally blonde hair but went even blonder a few months ago and I felt like i was having the worst shedding of my life.  Literally strands/clumps of hair would come out when I washed my hair and I think it was due to the bleaching of my very virgin never bleached before hair.  I started using this a couple weeks ago to try and curb some of the hair loss and while I haven't noticed any extra thickness in my hair (yet, i also do have naturally thick hair) I have noticed a SIGNIFICANT improvement in shedding, like barely noticeable now.  I really only use it on my wet/damp hair right out of the shower, I feel like it makes my hair a bit greasy used on dry hair, the formula can also leave a bit of a sticky residue on my hands after rubbing it in.  I dock one star for the price vs. quantity.  I could see going through this small bottle very quickly if I was using one full dropper every day as recommended and at this price point that can add up very quickly.  Luckily I only wash my hair a couple times a week so hopefully this will last a bit longer.  Also difficult to get a full dropper filled, it usually only goes about half or 3/4 full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I havent seen any reviews say this, but every time I use this serum, I get a bad headache all across my scalp. Its taken me a while to figure out the correlation, but this serum makes my scalp very sensitive and then causes head pain. I do not recommend this if you are prone to migraines or headaches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It really works! I was 100% sure that it will NOT work for me but it actually works. I gotta recommend it to everyone now. The only con is the price. Its dang expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont believe I have ever left a review on Sephora so here it goes. This product is amazing. Along with my vitamins. Ive been taking vitamins postpartum and recently in the past month on my 4th month mark, my hair started to fall out. I was cleaning off ny brush twice in one brush session and my shower kept getting clogged because of how much hair I lost. Ive never experienced this with any of my other pregnancies. So when I noticed the front of my scalp was looking less tanned than usual I realized my hair was falling out. I could no longer hide it. I started using this product immediately, without paying attention and using it daily along with my skincare I noticed today when trying to tame flyaways certain hairs just wouldnt sit. And I realized this product was actually doing its job. I couldnt believe it. Mind you Ive been taking vitamins for months now and I know for a fact that this product made the difference and is likely the prime reason my hair is growing back within a month. Its just sprouting, that I hadnt noticed before.  Buy this product. Give it a chance! I hope it works out for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'd been looking for products to help with postpartum hair loss and found Vegamour and thought I'd give it a try despite the expensive price tag. After using the serum in conjunction with the shampoo and conditioner I began getting small breakouts around my hairline but the real problem was the deep, painful pimples that formed on my scalp. The only thing I changed in my beauty regimen was this product so I know it was Vegamour products. Not worth the price tag and the pimples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used it for postpartum hair loss and Im seeing a lot of new growth along my hairline. If youre unsure due to the cost try it because it works pretty fast and a little goes a long way. I dont use it daily and Ive still noticed growth I wasnt seeing using supplements alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive seen a big difference in just 2-3 months of using the serum alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the first bottle for about a 6 weeks, saw a small difference but stopped for about 2 months. Now I bought it again and I just love how my scalp feel it with. Ive been trying different serums and this one gave me the beat results so far, and without making my hair too oily. Worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair and it makes my hair greasy even if I just put half the dropper on it. I dont know about any hair growth yet. Only had it for 2 weeks and havent noticed a difference but most of the reviews said you have to do it for 3 months and have at least 3 bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have only been using for around 1.5 months so I cannot accurately review hair growth yet but ease of application gets 5 stars as well as the fact that it does not make your hair oily or greasy! I apply and my hair is wet from the solution for a little while but dries quickly and you cant tell I put anything on. Other hair growth things I have tried definitely make you oily after application or hair feels wierd/stiff. Cant wait to see what this product delivers after a few months of daily usage.
I'm very disappointed in this product. The alcohol denat ingredient dried out both my hair and scalp. I want a refund.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so far nothing has been noticed except a few sore spots on my scalp

reviews.review_title: Vegamour GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a month and a half. It did absolutely nothing. My hair still did not grow, but became very oily. Don't buy this product it did nothing for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was so expensive and had enough product for about 2 weeks useage before it completely ran out.  The bottle wasn't even full even though I was the only one who opened & purchased the product.  Will not be buying again.  Waste of money.

reviews.review_title: I see baby hair growing within 3 months!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been experiencing hair loss due to stress lately. And, I have tried different products ranging from hair scrubs to hair serums but none of them really worked for me.   I love this hair serum by Vegamour. So far, it has worked pretty well.   The consistency is a lil bit thin. Almost watery.   But after using it consistently for three months, I noticed baby hair growing along my hairline. It smells great.  I personally feel the price tag is a lil bit on the expensive side. But its worth it!  The packaging looks luxe but it is actually a plastic bottle. However, the dropper is made of glass.   I had high hopes for this product and I must say that it didnt disappoint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo expensive it only last for 2 weeks. Highly disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant trying this product since it is kinda pricy. However, I am so happy with my results. The top photo you can see my fanning of hair loss compared to the bottom after using this product. I also have a large intake of bitoin daily but didnt see as much result compared to using the gro product. It is expensive but worth it for me. Hopefully I can wear my hair in a pony tail again soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the vegamour gro hair serum is AMAZING!! ive used it for three months consistently & have seen major growth in my hair!! i love that the formula is water based so it doesnt leave my hair looking oily!! i recommend this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. It has a really watery consistency, so you have to be pretty quick with rubbing it into your scalp before it goes onto your face/neck/back. My before and after is only 1 month a part, WITH consistency of everyday.   The important thing about this is CONSISTENCY. I stopped using it for a couple months because it is a bit pricey, but Ive now learned it totally worth it since Ive started to have some thinning and balding again. I use it every other night now/before my hair wash days. I try not to use it on my non hair wash days; it isnt too oily but just not preferable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for three months and have noticed a slight increase in the fullness of my hair. I like how its easy to apply, feels lightweight and does not leave an oily or greasy feeling or residue in my hair. The key is to consistently apply this daily and rub it in!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FYI I did not get this product for free. I did some research after I noticed my hairline on the sides were starting to thin. Playing sports my whole life w/ tight ponytails, buns and headbands has finally done a number. Also dying my hair line greys has added to the stress on my hair. I am more than halfway through my first bottle, I use it religiously everyday or minimal 1-2 a week when I have a blow out. I 100% see a difference and regrowth in a little over a month. You need to give it a minimum of 4-6 weeks and more than one bottle. I will def be repurchasing after I finish my second bottle as I was full hair for my wedding day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum for the past three months and I am completely blown away by how effective it is. Youre supposed to use it every single day and this serum does not weigh your hair down or make it greasy. I have curly hair but I often do the slick back bun which tends to make my hair break or thin at the hairline. This serum has completely restored the thickness and has stimulated so much new growth. This is definitely the real deal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This will not grow your hair. I tried this out for 9 months, before it ever came to Sephora, and its truly just hair oil. If you really want hair growth try VIVISCAL or an FDA approved product - minoxidil. Do not waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After 3 months Im still not sure how I feel about this product. It did do something for my hair but theres not a huge noticeable difference. The product itself is nice, it didnt leave my hair greasy when using it and its really easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say about this serum?! AMAZING! I absolutely love this serum.. Why? One reason being, it isnt oily at all. When you use this serum, it kinda melts into your scalp and your scalp is as if there isnt anything there. It was hard to keep up with putting this serum on my scalp every night but what helped me was setting an alarm everyday for 10:30 PM and next thing you know it became part of my routine. The only thing is with this serum you have to be consistent with it.. if youre not going to be consistent then theres no point in buying it. I have nothing bad to say about this serum. I revived results I wanted to see and Im so happy. It says you need one full dropper a day but it was kinda hard for me to get my dropper filled fully, it would only go half way and I guess thats the only con I have about this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this hair treatment serum! Its lightweight and non greasy with no fragrance. It didnt irritate my scalp or make my hair oilier. I mostly used it on day 1 & 2 hair and changing where I would place drops of the serum on my scalp. So I didnt use it everyday mostly due to my dry shampoo also. In terms on results, I see slight growth around the hairline and temples. Where I see the most significant results is in the shower. The serum has really helped with hair retention- there is significantly less hair fall out in the shower. Im also seeing overall more volume to my hair. In turn, I think the serum is working and is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has been such a saver for me. I was starting my PRP session and had to stop due to being pregnant and noticed my hair started to get weak again so I decided to give this a try and Im so glad I did!   Im seeing a lot of hair growth and not seeing so much hair fall when I brush or wash my hair.  I will continue to use religiously for the rest of my life! I feel like even if youre not going through hair loss its a healthy product for your hair to make sure it stays healthy. I used it consistently for 3 months I did forget some days but was pretty consistent for the most part.   I was diagnosed with alopecia but at this point Im not really sure, but Im glad I found something thats helping me so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really noticed a difference after using these drops for 3 months on my scalp. I would apply it and massage it in. It didnt make my hair greasy or anything so I would absolutely recommend these especially if you need something for hair loss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im blown away but this hair growth serum! I had seen it advertised on social media channels and was skeptical but excited to try it. Im 36 and have noticed a significant hair thinning in the last 5 years. I used the product as directed and have seen some major changes. My parts are not as deep and I am in month three really starting to notice some thickening. I used to ALWAYS wear my hair curled, to add volume and the illusion of thicker hair. Now Im finally able to wear my hair straight again!!! Ive included photos from month 1 and month 3. It looks so much fuller - even though my hair today is dirty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Vegamour serum! First of all, the light pink and gold packaging is absolutely gorgeous. It looks beautiful on my vanity. The serum itself does not make my hair oily, and Ive definitely noticed new growth especially on my hair line after using it for months. I will definitely continue enjoying its benefits!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this out for the last 3 months, I have definitely noticed that my hair felt a lot thicker and voluminous. The sparse areas that I felt self conscious about started to fill up with some baby hairs which I'm happy about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the serum daily for 3 months. It absorbed well and wasnt heavy in my fine hair. I didnt notice less shedding but my hair did feel stronger and healthier. I did notice my hair was getting extremely long too. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is so good! My hair is thinner and not so full. I noticed such a huge difference right after a month, baby hair all around my temples. Now, after three months of using this serum my hair has grown significantly and it feels so much fuller. Its a watery consistency, it absorbs quickly, smells really nice and it doesnt leave your hair greasy. I highly recommend this serum! It really works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just ok. I really wanted to love this product. Sadly after 3 months it did nothing for me. My hair is one of my biggest insecurities. I have 2 areas where my hair has thinned drastically and no new growth.

I didn't really think this hair serum would work as well as it did, but boy was I wrong. I've always been self-conscious when pulling my hair back in a ponytail because I know my hair looked extra thin especially near the hairline. After using this product for three months I can say that I've definitely seen improvement in the appearance of my hair and have been wearing my hair up more often. It definitely boosted my confidence. Must-have for people with thin hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had a wonderful experience with this product, my hair is fine and it had not grown for a long time as I really wanted, but this product has advanced my hair growth in 3 months, it really works!  you just have to be persistent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like Ive seen a decent amount of growth in 3 months, Ive been applying it to some thin patched above my temples as well as my hair line. Its a runny/watery consistency, and has to be quickly rubbed into scalp in the desired area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This GRO Hair Serum is amazing. I have been using it every day for three months and I am so happy with the results!  It has a water-based formula and the serum quickly penetrates into the hair follicles, so no need to worry about excess oil on the scalp nor greasy hair.  My hair became visibly thicker, fuller, and healthier-looking. I definitely recommend this serum to people with thinning or fallout hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using the hair serum for 3 months and Im happy with the results! My hair near the temple is thicker now and looks fuller. The serum itself is very pleasant and easy to use with a nice scent and watery consistency. It leaves my hair feeling fresh and not greasy. Highly recommend you give it a try if you have thinnning problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this serum for 3 months now and Ive definitely noticed a slight difference. My baby hairs look longer and my hair feels smoother. That being said, its definitely not a magic serum but it does help

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is fabulous!! I have thin hair and have a lot of hair loss. I am happy to have found this serum that has helped me get my hair back to the way it was before. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the GRO Hair Serum for Thinning Hair for 3 full months. I personally did not see any difference in my hair or any new baby hair growth starts. I also do not see my individual hairs growing thicker or having any less shedding than before. I have long had issues with hair thinning and have yet to find something that works for me. I think maybe this serum is more suited for temporary hair changes where hair is likely to grow back anyway, like in like stress-related hair loss rather than ongoing problems like I have. As for the bottle, dispensing, and directions; it says to use one dropper full daily and each bottle lasts one month. I have found that the dropper only fills half way up (about 1 inch high), so when I first started using this I was doing one dropper full as stated. I noticed 2 weeks in that I should have been at a half full bottle but I had more so I started using 2 droppers full daily. Since I was applying to my whole scalp rather than a spot treatment this felt right, like I was actually getting the product everywhere it needed to go. So for me 2 droppers full daily works out to one bottle per month. This needs to be addressed in the directions as people might be using too little product as there is no fill line on the dropper and it doesn't fill to the top.  As for texture, this isn't oily and didn't make my hair greasy. I applied it at night and massaged it in. Once dry it is like it was never there so there is no residue. So overall, if you have ongoing hair loss issues this might not be for you as it didn't work for me. If you have temporary hair loss, check the other reviews to see if it works for others in similar situations. If you are spot treating then one dropper might be enough, but for full scalp, you may need 2 droppers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After three months of consistent use, Ive definitely got some thoughts!  Before I get into my review, heres some background for context: Im in my late 30s and have been experiencing thinning hair/hair loss, particularly around the crown, for the past 15 years or so. I have hypothyroidism and PCOS which contribute to this.  Ive tried several shampoos, sprays, serums and treatments over the years and nothing has really worked. Im happy to report that this Vegamour serum *actually* helps!  Some cons: At nearly $60 a bottle, the high price tag makes it less accessible. If you stop using it, your hair will go back to how it was prior to useu2026you HAVE to use it consistently and this of course adds up fast. In my experience, I found it to cause small irritation bumps if applied to a non-clean scalp. I prefer to not wash my hair daily and this didnt play well with dry shampoo.   Has it miraculously grown my hair back to a luscious mane full of body? No. But it absolutely has helped to retain hair, grow new hair, lengthen existing hair, and is (very) slowly starting to close in the gap I have on my crown! I also love how easy it is to apply and that it doesnt make my hair greasyu2014something I experienced with most orher products Ive tried.  Together with a healthy lifestyle, this has been such a great tool to bring my confidence back! Im sure many of you reading know how traumatizing it is to experience hair falling out in fist fulls every time you wash or brush your hairu2026Shes pricey, but this Vegamour serum absolutely helps!

Before using this product my Hair is really thin, my scalp looks a little dirty cause of dandruff,  and my hair is everywhere cause of hair fall.. After using it for 3 months my hair looks better, not so thin looking.. Im seeing a lot of newly hair growth and my scalp looks clean.. I still have hair fall but not as much as before.. reviews.review_text: This has been a journey! I went from having a huge bald spot to having hair (MIRACULOUS I know!) in the first pic, This is me literally giving up after months of trying! Oils, vitamins, you name it!  1st month - I applied it religiously over my entire head. Didnt miss a day! and I clearly saw baby curls! There was new hair spouting weekly! Second month was good enough for me to end with a good haircut even! Third month I started treating  only the spots on the front. And last 2 weeks of 3rd month I figured Im good and can apply on some days and skip some maybe! But thats where things began to turn around. My hair fall started slowly again. Now at the end of my 3 months, I see some hair fall and Im terribly worried. Hair still looks good as of now but I see the new hair falling and thats whats worrying me terribly. I didnt think I would have to keep using this all the time.  Maybe Ill have to try a 6 month treatment to insure the growth of my hair.  As of now I am worried about losing the new hair I was getting used to.

In my opinion they are lying because this item does work but you need to be patient. Your hair didn't fall out in one day. Its going to take time to grow back. If it really matters to you will give it 6 months atleast. It is an investment but it's your hair. Aside from that I only use it on the areas I need I don't even use a full dropper. I buy one bottle per month for me and my daughter and we both use it on the front of our hairline.

reviews.review_title: GET THIS IF YOU HAVE BALD SPOTS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't begin to say how happy I am that I found this. Three years ago I visited a new hair stylist and she told me I had a bald spot in the middle, front part of my head, near my forehead. I was so embarrassed and self conscious about it that I started parting my hair to the side to hide it. I didn't really do anything to treat it aside from trying to wear my hair in loose, low styles and only parting it to the side. I was so self conscious about it! When I learned about Vegamour, I was curious and hopeful. I bought my first bottle in Feb 2021, and in Aug 2021 I finally started parting my hair in the middle and felt much more confident. My part looks much more full.   I use it EVERY night after my shower. I literally mean every night. I have probably missed around 12 days where I didn't put it on in the last 10 months because I forgot, so I literally put it on almost every single night. You HAVE to be consistent. I took pics every month and after month two I noticed a difference. SO HAPPY! I am so thankful that I found this because my bald spot was a major insecurity that I finally feel is practically gone. I will continue using it daily until Feb 2022, and then I plan to only use it every other day instead of nightly. THANK YOU VEGAMOUR!

reviews.review_text: Doesnt do anything.  Relies on the bodies natural growth and shedding cycle to convince you that it works.  I think the only thing in it is caffeine.  Did nothing for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used the hair serum along with the gummies and shampoo/conditioner, since the start of 2021 and so far absolutely love it.  Covid did a number on stress for me and my hair was limp and I was shedding like crazy. Ever since Ive been using it the shedding is so minimal Im hardly cleaning out my brush. I also make sure to massage the serum into my scalp I think that helps as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for half a year and have had great results! I got covid at the beginning of the year and three months later my hair began to fall out. I started using Vegamour and this serum specifically has helped grow back much of what was lost. It feels fuller and healthier and looks way thicker when I style it. Been using it along side the shampoo and conditioner which I LOVE! Cant wait to continue with my results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product consistently for a little over a month. Im not one that concludes easily that a single product caused a huge change because there are so many factors to take into consideration. With that being said, I do feel my hair has become slightly more poofy, if that makes sense? I mean that in a good way, its like I have slightly more hair on my head. It seems as though my hair is a little thicker but it could be that its not easily breaking. I do think this serum is working. 4 stars bc again, I cannot contribute this change in my hair to this single product as I am taking vitamins, use hair oil, leave in treatments, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, Ive noticed an increase in hair density and growth since I started using this product 2 months ago.  I know it works because when I stop using it Ive noticed the growth slows in the spot Ive been using it on.  I recently purchased the shampoo and conditioner and hope to see more results using the entire line.

reviews.review_title: Spend $ on something that actually works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dont. Just dont. I used Vegamour for MONTHS, (not weeks like some of the other reviews). I say this because  - Any hair growth product has to be used for at least 3 months before you can see results. And some will cause an initial shedding. All vegamour did was create an oily scalp environment, and clog hair follicles. Im not sure why Sephora picked up this company, because in addition to products not working, they were notorious for poor customer service, shipping delays, and etc. I guess putting their product in a shiny new package duped someone in product.  If you want to regrow hair spend your $ on - minoxidil, PRP, red light therapy at 680, address any hormonal issues, and or vitamin deficiencies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i had a horrible experience with this product: my scalp broke out, i continued to lose hair, and it only made my scalp greasy. i bought it from the original site, where i wrote a comment about my experience. my review was not only not posted, but i received an email from the brand instead saying essentially u201csorry you didnt like the product.u201d i do not trust this brand to be transparent with the reviews that they post. i will never give them another cent. i suggest trying the better not younger serum or bondi boost products instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After taking before and after photos I saw a difference in hair length after a week! that's absolutely crazy! keep in mind everyone is different and everyone's body reacts differently. Regardless-- This product has a lot of great ingredients inside of it for overall scalp health, so I like that. I have Asian hair that is very flat and this did not weigh it down, i was in shock because usually any leave on product will leave my hair looking greasy.. Online it does say you see results in 3 months but my body is sensitive and I saw it very quickly. I'm obsessed. I am hoping Sephora will start to carry instore so it is easily accessible!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, thin hair and was hoping this might help. I started losing way more hair. When I stopped using this, the hair loss stopped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this Serum for almost 3 months mostly on the areas that showed the most hair loss. It did absolutely nothing except make my hair oily. I do not know where the good reviews come from but definitely did nothing for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this with the CBD for about three months and found nothing changed with my hair at all. Even to pics to track the progress. Like most women using thisu2026 we have thin and or fine hair. This made my hair oily which meant I had to wash my hair everyday to apply this. Its just not worth it. Massage probably helps more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been working for me. In fact my hair stylist who I had not seen in a while due to COVID immediately said my hair felt thicker.  Its a slow process and I do not use it every day which probably another reason its been a slower process for me. I  also started using a thickening shampoo recently so hope that will will help speed things along

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I brought it on the original website. I have oily thin hair and I realized that I was losing more hair using it. I was losing too much I had to stop and once I stop my hair loss stopped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I pretty much tried all their products but couldnt not notice any difference in hair thinning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for three months (before Sephora had it). Had no growth and actually made my scalp more oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this. Used it when I lost hair around my hairline after having my 2nd baby. My hair grew back a lot faster than it did when I had my 1st child.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No change in hair growth/density. Would not recommend or repurchase. Very expensive gimmick product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good product. Reasonable price.  Didnt promote growth but has stopped shedding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes hair greasy. Didn't work for me. Mote $$ than Rogaine. Dropper is messy & product ends up dripping down my face. I have to wash my hair in the morning or my hair feels greasy & lifeless. I do like their dry shampoo, but I think I'll just stick with Rogaine for now.

reviews.review_title: Actual hair loss specialist says no to Vegamour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Vegamour is snake oil. An expensive promise that does not deliver. I used it for 6 months taking weekly progress pictures. Zero progress. After 6 months I finally got in with a hair loss specialty dermatologist, one of the best in the country, and she told me that Vegamour will do absolutely nothing for hair loss.   It's a waste of money. An empty promise in a pink bottle. DO NOT waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is easy to use and a very watery texture. I apply it to my hairline and a little extra at temples every other night. It doesnt make my hair greasy which is nice. I cant say for sure that it is working but I do think I noticed a little bit of new growth. I will continue to use the product until its gone. Time will tell how effective it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product claims to boost hair growth after 90 days of use. I am nearing day 30 without seeing any real improvement. Normally, I would wait a full 90 days to review but Vegamour requires reviews for samples to happen sooner- so here we are! Overall, I like the way the serum smells and love the fact that I can use it without having a greasy scalp the next morning. They advise you to coat your entire scalp which isnt really feasible for me. I would blow through this stuff in a week if that were the case. Instead Ive been using this on my part to help with my frizz. Again, no noticeable improvements yet but I will re-review at the 90-dat mark.

This stuff is junk, one bottle does not last a whole month and it recommended you use it for 3 months to see growth. Whatever you do, don't subscribe to order the bottle online at their website for a cheaper rate, they make you go through hoops to cancel-you cannot cancel online. Also, they skew the reviews as well, I left a negative review on their site that never showed up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to test and provide a review. I figured it wouldnt do too much but still took a before (on right) and after (on left) picture. I was wrong about it not doing much! Over the years, Ive experienced some hair loss along my hairline from wearing a tight low bun in the military. Fortunately, its starting to grow back now! The before and after pictures are about 4 weeks apart after using the gummies, serum, shampoo and conditioner daily. My hair has started to fill back in and Im so excited! The serum doesnt weigh down my hair or make it look oily/greasy which is great, but it might be making me break out along my hairline a tiny bit. However, when used with the other products at least it does seem to work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as complementary to try it, I like it and it became part of my routine but I did notice that I need to wash my hair earlier than normal because it gets greasy faster when I use this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product.  I love the idea of everything it promises.  But I hated it.  Even down to the fruity pebbles- like smell.  My hair felt funky and gunky after using it, weighed down and lifeless.  I usually wash my hair every 4-5 days, but with this I could only go 1.  I would not recommend it.  I did not notice any additional hair growth in the time I used it and have no desire to continue trying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is very watery and drips everywhere. It smells good and does feel nice while you rub it into the scalp. It does not weigh down your hair or leave it oily where you apply. I was putting it on everyday and I havent noticed much regrowth after a month. In combination with the shampoo and conditioner I have seen less breakage though. I would probably repurchase this, but the shampoo and conditioner are the big winners for me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a $50 investment, this is a $200-250 investment. You will see no change with the first bottle, which doesnt mean its not working though. Im on my 5th bottle (I got a subscription through their website: cheaper than Sephora) and I have more hair on my head than Ive ever had. Keep using it regularly and dont expect quick results. It works slowly because hair follicles have different growth and dormant phases. The solution (its watery but smells nice) keeps the hair in their growth phase for longer so they keep growing BUT your hair follicles will go back to their default setting once you stop using Vegamour. Translation: You lose all the new hair Vegamour gave you within a month or two of discontinuing it. To maintain the growth, you can use it 3 times a week instead of every day to make it last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its doesnt makes my hair looks sticky and oily rather it brings a light shine to my hair making them more healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this & the Gro+ serum for months, & I havent seen any improvement in shedding or growth. I have thinning hair from hypothyroidism, & Im trying anything affordable to get my hair back to its natural state. No luck so far. When I asked Vegamour if Im doing anything wrong, they recommended their over-priced/hyped gummies & other expensive products. Hard pass. Waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this product for over 3 weeks now in combination with other items (conditioner, shampoo and gummies) and have not noticed much of a difference. I like that it wouldnt make my hair oily but it was a bit funnier than I had expected it to be. Lightly scented and dropper worked fine. I expect there will be a difference if I continue with all products for an extended period of time. I received these items complimentary for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Most serums that I have used end up making my hair very oily but this serum did not do that. I think my hair looks a little fuller but I am not sure if that is the shampoo and conditioner I am using or this serum. I have noticed that my scalp has been irritated when I use this serum. I have spent a few days without applying it to see if that helped so it appears that my scalp is sensitive to an ingredient in there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Only been using this for a month but I feel like this line has been making my hair healthier and grow faster than it usually does! Also I was pleasantly surprised that this did not make my hair feel greasy when I put it on my scalp even though my hair tends to get oily easily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cute packaging. Easy to use. Doesnt make hair oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula had a light scent and a super thin consistency; it smelled sweet like sweettarts candy. I used this product for approximately three weeks and didn't notice any difference in the thickness of my hair.  I received this complimentary to test from Influenster. And while I'm grateful for the opportunity to try out a product I wouldn't have purchased myself, I won't be buying it again. I found absolutely no difference in my hair at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has grown so fast! Even the men in my house have been using the serum on their goatee haha. Can leave your scalp oily, really only need a drop or two!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly hair (3Bish?) with a scalp that can get oily easily. I was a little skeptical to use it as if I needed even more oil on my scalp, but it was not bad at all. I actually enjoy it, and you cannot even notice the oil if you really u201caimu201d for the scalp as opposed to dropping the oil on your hair and then massage it down to the scalp. I used it daily as advised, and I have noticed while I used it, my scalp is more sensitive, but the hair that has been coming from my scalp is softer. However, I also use the shampoo, conditioner, and eat the vitamin gummies as well, so all of them together have been doing well for my hair health. This could be the combination of all of them, but I think this is truly making a difference in my hair. I did receive this from Influenster to review for free, however, this review is my honest option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product free to review, however I dont think its for me. When applied to the scalp as directed, it made my hair look really greasy. I have medium thickness hair, maybe someone with drier, coarser hair would have better luck. I would rather eat the gummies, those are great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free to review. I had a baby in December and started losing my hair due to hormones changing. I started using this serum about a month ago and already have little baby hairs growing! I cant wait to see how much it helps the longer I use it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample from Influenster, hated the shampoo and conditioner but this doesnt have the same scent as those. Used it pretty religiously with every hair wash for the last month but havent seen much of a difference in terms of hair growth honestly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for about 30 days and saw no difference.  I have long, thin, fine, highlighted hair. It did make my scalp itchy and from what I could tell, no hair growth? You may need to use this for an extended period of time to see results.  Maybe 60 or 90 days use?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great. Left my hair oily when I used a full dropper as instructed so I use half.  I cant tell if it helped my hair to grow more or thickeru2026 but it has seemed to help my dry scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product I just dont think Ive been using it long enough to see actual results. Ive heard great things about it so I will continue to use it and see how it works. It doesnt make my scalp oily which Is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this Vegamour GRO serum for over a month now along with the Vegamour shampoo, Vegamour Conditioner, and Vegamour gummies. It had a medicinal smell, but thankfully faded quickly. I have been using for over a month now. I have noticed some new growth in thinning hair areas on my scalp. It doesn't make my hair feel greasy or weighed down which is great. You are supposed to see real results in 3 months, but not sure I can justify the cost of the 1 oz bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably my favorite product from Vegamour, it is light weight and easy to apply. My hair is super prone to oiliness and this seemed to work well with my scalp. I think if you are on the fence, this one is worth giving a shot. My hair does look thicker and I have been using the whole system for about a month now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Vegamour for about a year now. Before that, I had waist length hair I cut for locks of love and in a decade it never grew back past my shoulders. I was horrified. Constant shoulder length hair was making me feel crazy. I started using this and really giving the massage part some credence. If you use it at night and aren't showering you wind up with hair that's thicker and easier to deal with. After a few months you notice the baby hairs. After half a year you see your hair has actually started growing and now at a year I have hair past my bra hooks. I live for this. It gave me my confidence back.

reviews.review_title: On the fence with this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on the fence with this product.  I honestly don't see much of a difference with my hair but to be fair, there were days that I would completely forget to put it in. So because of that, I can't really say whether the issue is with the product or just my forgetfulness.  I expect that, as with anything,  this takes time but I've been using the whole line for a month now and haven't really seen a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are willing to wait and be patient for results then this product is for you. I have been using this for a month and I cant tell if theres a difference with my hair or not? I wouldnt buy this if you arent willing to spend some time and money and dedication to this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love using this serum - although you are supposed to need about three months to see results.  I have been using this for the past month or so with the shampoo, conditioner and gummies.  However, I have been using this every day (did not use the shampoo/conditioner daily), including with other shampoos/conditioners in order to test its effect.   I was pleasantly surprised that this did not feel greasy at all - it has a pleasing smell too.  It definitely made my hair easier to style and helped a bit with the frizz.  Its a little pricy but other hair serums I have used in the past (John Frieda, Biosilk, etc) would tend to make my hair greasy if I wasnt super careful. So, for me this is 100% worth repurchasing, and would recommend for others who also have fine/straight hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is light weight and doesn't make my thin hair greesy at all. I rubbed it in with my scalp scrubber to really rub it in, and my hair looked fuller at the roots,  and less shedding.  I received this item in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this serum for about a month, every other day after washing my hair (I dont shampoo every day). Ive been using it in conjunction with the GRO shampoo and conditioner and the gummies. Because Ive been using the whole set, it is difficult to say what product specifically is effective. I have noticed a slight lessening of the amount I shed in my hairbrush. I will need to use for longer to get a better sense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had pretty bad post-partum thinning at my temples and when Covid hit, it returned. This helped fill in those thinning areas. I definitely noticed a difference before the 3 months but for those giving negative reviews after a month or less didnt give it long enough to work. Give it a shot, youll see a difference! I love that its not oily so it doesnt cause buildup to the hair. I spot treat areas on my head and massage it in nightly. I truly love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really, really wanted to see results with this but I havent yetu2026 which may be because I havent used it long enough. Ive been using it for a month (daily), but the brand recommends I think three months of use before you find a noticeable difference. Im going to keep using until my supply runs out and am hoping something changes. Beyond results, here are a few other notes: The application is really easy but sometimes the dropper dispenses too much product. I have oily hair and was expecting this to increase oil production or make my hair look even greasieru2026 but surprisingly there was no change! Smell is okay but not as good as the shampoo and conditioner.  All in all, if youre interested Id say give it a shot! I really havent had any negative experiences with this product and am going to keep using until I run out or see good results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It worked well I guess, but I started getting crazy greasy hair & it wasnt worth it to me. Used it for about two weeks couldnt handle it & never used it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try out for an honest review. Ive only used the product for 3 1/3 weeks and I wash my hair everyday and would apply it every night. I did use the whole bottle using it nightly. It is not an oily serum so it will not make your hair greasy at all. I would like to have seen the results after 3 months but it is not something I would buy again just due to the fact that I wash so often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved my product thanks to Influenster and Vegamour in exchange for my honest review.  You know that scene in Sweeney Todd with Pirelli's Miracle Elixer? This gave me those vibes. I had previously looked at this product and considered purchasing in the past, but after receiving it for free, I am glad my money was spared. I have fairly thin superfine hair that tangles if you look at it funny, and after trying the instructions of massaging it into my scalp on both damp and dry hair, I got tangles, and had to blow dry my hair because it was wet after trying on dry hair alone. The only way to try it was to drop it on in strategic places and use a wet brush and gently brush it through. I noticed practically no growth in my hair, but did notice my baby hairs at my temples looked a little fuller. The bottle says 30 day supply, but even using a single dropper full, I have excess product, so if I continue to use it, it will take maybe 40 days per bottle. I do not plan on continuing however, because it was too much of a hassle adding it in my very tight morning schedule, and had minimal results, even if they tell you it takes 3-4 months for any real results.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use w/sweet scent but didn't see differenc
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The serum was clear, light weight and smelled good. It was easy to apply and did not stimg or burn. I used the entire product along with the line of products for 30 days straight. I didn't see any huge difference in hair growth or volume, but I did have much more manageable hair with little use product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum with the matching shampoo and conditioner every 2-3 days for about three weeks. I notice that my hair is less frizzy now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive only had the product for 2 weeks it have already noticed a huge difference with how my scalp feels! Ive had an itchy scalp on and off for as long as I can remember. Ive been using this product consistently every day for the last two weeks and I can already feel a huge difference in the dryness of my scalp! It has drastically calmed the itching/flakiness! Excited to see further results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 3 weeks. Used with the shampoo and conditioner.  There was little to no smell, very thin and not a thick oil. One dropper goes a long way. Did not make my hair oily at all. I did notice some improvement to a small spot I have.  I received a free sample in exchange for an honest review, but this is something I would buy when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The serum is great! It is not oily, which is definitely an issue that I deal with. The scent of this product is also great. It is easy to work with in the hair and does not weigh it down. I will definitely be incorporating it into my routine when I wash my hair. I've also seen a difference in the thickness of my hair. I don't have thick hair as is, it is a little bit on the thin side and this product worked well to add some volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dont really have any way of judging if this did anything to my already pretty thick hair, but as far as a serum goes, its nice. Good packaging and easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its like an extra bit of hydration for your scalp that also brings back your hair density. The serum is very thin but doesnt grease up your scalp. I only wash my hair twice a week and put this on every other day. I can see more baby hairs coming back, slowly but surely. This also has the same scent as the shampoo & conditioner. Excited to keep using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although I did receive this item for free to try from Influenster, I really liked it. The packaging is nice and it was easy to use. It only takes a few drops and it has helped my thinning hair some, although I have only tried it for a few weeks now. My only issue is the price point for such a small bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So its kinda hard for me to give a full review of just this serum alone because I have been using it with the Vegamour GRO Revitalizing Shampoo & Conditioner and the GRO Biotin Gummies (which I HIGHLY recommend those as well) but the results I have gotten in just one month are unbelievable. My long stringy thin hair is now long luxurious hair with volumeu2026 which honestly I never thought I would achieve with my hair type and age (I am only 38 but I have noticed so much more thinning since I turned 35).  I am super excited to keep using this and see the results after the recommended 90 days of use! I was gifted the first 30 days from Influenster for my honest review but I will be purchasing since I have seen incredible results in the 30 days I have been using and wanna keep achieving more luxurious hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

This product is lightweight and does not leave any kind of residue afterward. Plus, it smells amazing!! I would highly recommend this product to anyone struggling with thinning hair.

I have been using thos serum along with the shampoo, conditioner, and gummies for three weeks now. I enjoyed this serum because it was really lightweight and did not leave a greasy feeling. All around, I have experienced less hair loss and small growth in length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Had I known a year ago how well this product would work, I would have taken some before photos:). I have always had a wackadoodle hair line; uneven and patchy, but not anymore. GRO Hair Serum has filled in my hairline around my face with all new baby sprouts of hair, and it keeps growing. Originally, I started using this product for hair loss prevention while I slide into peri-menopause, and my fine hair is the thickest its been since I was a kid. You have to use it once daily to see results, but its as light as water in your hair with no residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having thyroid problems and crazy Jiujitsu training has resulted in hair breakage and thinning. I have been using faithfully since August 2020 and have the results. I started with 2x a day for 3 months and now use only 1x a day. Smells great and worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair that was thinning due to wearing ponytail has grown back. My hair looks great using this for past year. Several friends and family now use it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Due to stress, I started losing a lot of hair. After spending a lot of money on shampoos and conditioners that never did anything, I found this online. I have been using it for over a year, and  I can tell you it truly works! My hair has stopped shedding and is filling in where there was very  noticeable thinning. You just have to be patient. Some people might see a difference within a couple months, others it might take a little longer. Once I stopped looking every day for change, I'd say I noticed a nice difference at about 4 months. Also, one bottle will last you a full month if you apply it properly. I see people complaining about this all over here. I just put a drop on each problem area and then add a few more randomly and then massage it all through my hair with my fingertips. I do it on my dry hair at night, and I don't wake up with any greasiness.

reviews.review_title: Luscious thick hair can be yours!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Has made my hair much thicker and has slightly helped with growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for almost a year.  I started using this product because clumps of hair were coming out in the shower.  My once full head of hair just wasn't the same.  In an effort to reverse this, I tried Vegamour.  I'm happy to say that almost a year later, my hair has never been thicker or fuller.  I use Vegamour every night.  It does not leave a greasy residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been a loyal customer directly through Vegamour and I couldnt be happier with the product. I have thin hair and using the serum and shampoo it has help big time! After 3 months of using the product my hair continues to grow!!

reviews.review_text: I liked that it doesn't leave my hair greasy but this doesn't really do anything. No new growth, no encouragement of growth for baby hairs, nada. I got a little bit of shine and extra softness for my hair which was nice, but that's about it. It also doesn't last even 3 weeks if you have thicker or denser hair. it doesn't spread easily through the scalp before absorbing so you have to use more than I expected to get good coverage.   Really the only half decent product from this line is maybe the shampoo. Super disappointing.

reviews.review_text: I love this serum! It smells good and makes my hair feel so soft! Without looking greassy

reviews.review_text: I have been consistently using this product every night on wet hair, along with the shampoo, conditioner, and gummies. After about a month, I have not seen a difference in my hair growth or nails. That being said, this is by far my favorite product out of the four. It does not have the sickly sweet smell that the shampoo and conditioner have. My hair naturally gets oily quickly so I was worried this would make matters worse, but I actually have not seen a change in that area as well. Only negative I have is that the product is extremely thin. I have found that it is super hard to get the product to stay on your scalp before getting the chance to massage it in.

reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary to test from Influenster. Ive been using this serum for about 3 weeks now, so it is still too early to tell if it is making a difference in growth. However, I have used it enough times to say I dont like the consistency of this product. Its not a serum, its more like water. Its hard to keep the dropper from dripping the product on the counter or floor. Which is a waste. Its also hard to distribute the product on my scalp and massage in. If you do this on wet hair you cant tell where the product is vs the wet hair. It doesnt make my hair oily or weigh it down, so thats a plus. But overall Im not sure its doing anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far after using this product for a few weeks with the shampoo conditioner and vitamins I can tell a big difference in my hair. It is more full and soft and longer! I dont use the serum all the time but I do put it on wet hair instead of dry, it does not leave a residue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster in exchange for my honest review. Results typically show 90 days after consistent use. Ive been using it for just a month so its hard to say but I do feel like its working. Im also taking biotin and using the shampoo and conditioner as well so that could also be playing a part. I will continue to use and test this product for the full 90 days to see if it is truly working!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First timer to this product brand and I honestly love it Ive been using constantly and Ive seen a difference. Im not a big fan of the smell but it does the job.

reviews.review_title: Too soon to tell if it has an impact
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using this product for a few weeks, and I know full results come after 90 days, so it's hard to know if it's doing anything; but I received a free sample in exchange for my honest review.  The pros are that this stuff smells great, and it feels kind of luxurious giving myself a scalp massage each night before bed. (Not to mention, my hair looks super voluminous afterward!) It doesn't make my hair feel greasy either while applying the serum or after the fact - just feels like putting sweet smelling, cool water on my scalp.  I don't quite feel like a dropper-full is enough to cover my whole scalp, but that's how much they say to use, so I've just been trying to put the drops in a different part each night, hoping it evens out.  I'm excited to see over time if it works!

Im not sure if this product alone is to credit, but used with other Vegamour products, I can definitely tell that my hair is thicker. Im currently pregnant but am really excited to see what this product can do when Im postpartum & potentially expediting hair loss!

I do appreciate the bottle and the dropper to help put serum in the right place. It doesnt feel heavy or leave my hair greasy which was a concern since I have such thin/fine hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is cute and the smell is nice. But I havent  noticed anything really different so maybe I just need to try a little bit longer. I also like that its not crazy oily.

reviews.review_title: 3 bottles lasted less than a month. Not worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, calling this liquid a serum is quite misleading. FYI - this product has the same viscosity as water, and it does not spread! Before you buy, I suggest you see how difficult it is to spread evenly on your scalp even 1 fluid ounce of water. Then imagine being expected to do the same with one-thirtieth (1/30) of that amount, which is what you'll need to do for the bottle to last you a month.   From my experience, unless you have a bald head, the liquid will be absorbed by your hair follicles and evaporate within seconds of you attempting to blend it in. You'll arguably be creating friction and doing more damage to your existing hair by rubbing your very dry fingertips across your scalp each day trying to apply this product.   You know what I can say that's positive? The packaging is not that bad! I just went to look at my last empty glass bottle and noticed that the label is not a stick-on. It's just unfortunate, for me, because I value high-quality products more than high-quality packaging.   After 3 bottles, I did not see a single difference, and I do not believe this company works in good faith. Although I am disappointed that Sephora is backing this brand, hopefully, this means that Vegamour cannot continue to censor honest reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so so much! The little glass dropper bottle is perfect for applications, and it is beautiful as well. The smell so amazing. It smells fruity/ sweet in my opinion. The scent is not too strong but strong enough to smell it throughout the day. The product does not make my hair oily at all. When it dries, you can not see the product at all. My hair feels softer since I have started using their products everyday. It hasn't been enough days to know for sure if it is helping my thinning areas, but I feel like it is already helping. My hair feels like it actually has some volume to it. I will be buying these products again when I get close to running out. You have to try this product, it is amazing, trust me!

reviews.review_text: I used the serum daily. It absorbed well and wasnt heavy in my fine hair. I didnt notice less shedding but my hair did feel stronger when I ran my hand through it. I would recommend this product.

I already have ticker hair so I dont think these products would have the same results as someone with thinner hair. I do plan on using this during my postpartum to see if it helps rejuvenate my hair.
